GE07bhg4c18u:16: ity ādiṣu ca phala-mātra-tyāgena karmānuṣṭhānam upadiṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c18u:17: na ca paraspara-viruddhaṃ sarvajñaḥ parama-kāruṇiko bhagavān upadiśet /
GE07bhg4c18u:18: ataḥ karma-sannyāsasya tad-anuṣṭhānasya cāvirodha-prakāraṃ bubhutsur arjuna uvāca sannyāsasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:20: he keśī-nisūdana keśī-nāmno mahato hayākṛteḥ daityasya yuddhe mukhaṃ vyādāya bhakṣayitum
GE07bhg4c18u:21: āgacchato atyantaṃ vyātte mukhe vāma-bāhuṃ praveśya tat-kṣaṇam eva vivṛddhena tenaiva
GE07bhg4c18u:24: sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag vivekena veditum icchāmi //1//
GE07bhg4c18u:33: ity atra bhagavad-vākye mokṣa-kāṅkṣi-śabdena sannyāsina eva ucyante /
GE07bhg4c18u:34: anye vā yady anya eva te,
GE07bhg4c18u:35: tarhi - sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ tataḥ kuru yatātmavān iti (Gītā 12.11)
GE07bhg4c18u:36: tvad-uktānāṃ sarva-karma-phala-tyāgināṃ teṣāṃ sa tyāgaḥ kaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:37: sannyāsināṃ ca ko sa sannyāsa iti vivekato jijñāsur āha sannyāsasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:38: pṛthag iti yadi sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdau bhinnārthau tadā sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag veditum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:39: yadi tv ekārthau tāv api tvan-mate anya-mate vā tayor aikyārtham arthād ekārthatvam iti pṛthag veditum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:40: he hṛṣīkeśeti mad-buddheḥ pravartakatvāt tvam eva imaṃ sandeha-mukhāpayasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:41: keśi-nisūdana iti taṃ ca sandehaṃ tvam eva keśinam iva vidārayasīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:42: mahābāho iti tvaṃ mahā-bāhu-balānvito 'haṃ kiñcid bāhubalānvita ity etad aṃśenaiva mayā saha sakhyaṃ tava / na tu
GE07bhg4c18u:43: sārvajñyādibhir aṃśair atas tvad-datta-kiñcit-sakhya-bhāvād eva praśne mama niḥśaṅkateti bhāvaḥ //1//
GE07bhg4c18u:46: bhaktes tatra prapatteś ca so 'bravīd atigopyatām //
GE07bhg4c18u:48: (Gītā 5.13) ity ādau sannyāsa-śabdena kim uktam -- tyaktvā karma-phalāsaṅgaṃ (Gītā 4.20)
GE07bhg4c18u:49: ityādau tyāga-śabdena ca kim uktaṃ bhagavatā tatra sandihāno 'rjunaḥ pṛcchati sannyāsasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:50: sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdau śaila-taru-śabdāv iva vijātīyārthau kiṃ vā kuru-pāṇḍava-śabdāv iva sajātīyārthau /
GE07bhg4c18u:51: yady ādyas tarhi sannyāsasya tyāgasya ca tattvaṃ pṛthag-veditum icchāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:54: he mahābāho kṛṣṇa hṛṣīkeśeti dhī-vṛtti-prerakatvāt tvam eva mat-sandeham utpādayasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:55: keśi-nisūdaneti tvaṃ mat-sandehaṃ keśinam iva vināśayeti //1//
GE07bhg4c18u:58: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:60: Śrīdhara : tatrottaraṃ śrī-bhagavān uvāca - kāmyānām iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:61: kāmyānāṃ putra-kāmo yajeta svarga-kāmo yajetety evam ādi kāmopabandhena vihitānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ parityāgaṃ sannyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:62: samyak-phalaiḥsaha sarva-karmaṇām api nyāsaṃ sannyāsaṃ paṇḍitā vidur jānantīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:63: sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nitya-naimittikānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phala-mātra-tyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇā nipuṇāḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:65: nanu nitya-naimittikānāṃ phalāśravaṇād avidyamānasya phalasya kathaṃ tyāgaḥ syāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:67: ucyate yadyapi svarga-kāmaḥ paśukāma ity ādivad aharahaḥ sandhyām upāsīta yāvaj-jīvam
GE07bhg4c18u:68: agnihotraṃ juhotīty ādiṣu phala-viśeṣo na śrūyate tathāpy apuruṣārthe vyāpāre prekṣāvantaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:69: pravartayitum aśaknuvan vidhir viśvajitā yajetety ādiṣv iva sāmānyataḥ kim api phalam ākṣipaty eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:70: na cātīva-gurum ataḥ śraddhayā sva-siddhir eva vidheḥ prayojanam iti mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:72: śrūyate ca nityādiṣv api phalam - sarva ete puṇya-lokā bhavatīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:74: dharmeṇa pāpam apanudanti ity evam ādiṣu /
GE07bhg4c18u:75: tasmād yuktam uktaṃ sarva-karma-phala-tyāgaṃ prāhus tyāgaṃ vicakṣaṇā iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:76: nanu phala-tyāgena punar pai niṣphaleṣu karmasu pravṛttir eva na syāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:77: tan na, sarveṣām api karmaṇāṃ saṃyoga-pṛthaktvena vividiṣārthatayā viniyogāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:78: tathā ca śrutiḥ - tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakeneti /
GE07bhg4c18u:79: tataś ca śruti-padoktaṃ sarvaṃ phalaṃ bandhakatvena tyaktvā vividiṣārthaṃ sarva-karmānuṣṭhānaṃ ghaṭata eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:80: vividiṣā ca nityānitya-vastu-vivekena nivṛtta-dehādy-abhimānatayā buddheḥ pratyak-pravaṇatā /
GE07bhg4c18u:81: tāvat paryantaṃ ca sattva-śuddhy-arthaṃ jñānāviruddhaṃ yathocitam avaśyakaṃ karma kurvatas tat-phala-tyāga eva karma-tyāgo nāma /
GE07bhg4c18u:83: tathā ca śrutiḥ kurvann eveha karmāṇi jijīviṣec chatāṃ samāḥ (Īśo 2) iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:84: tataḥ parantu sarva-karma-nivṛttiḥ svata eva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:88: uktaṃ ca bhagavatā - yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād ity ādi /
GE07bhg4c18u:105: Viśvanātha : prathamaṃ prācyaṃ matam āśritya sannyāsa-tyāga-śabdayor bhinna-jātīyārthatvam āha kāmyānām iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:106: putra-kāmo yajeta svarga-kāmo yajeta ity evaṃ kāmopabandhena vihitānāṃ kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:107: nyāsaṃ svarūpeṇaiva tyāgaṃ sannyāsaṃ vidur na tu nityānām api sandhyopāstādīnām iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:108: sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nityānām api karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ karmaṇā pitṛlokaḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:109: dharmeṇa pāpam upanudati ity ādyāḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanty eva ity atas tyāge phalābhisandhi-rahitaṃ sarva-karma-karaṇam /
GE07bhg4c18u:111: kāmya-karmaṇāṃ tu svarūpeṇaiva tyāga iti bhedo jñeyaḥ //2//
GE07bhg4c18u:112: Baladeva : evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān uvāca kāmyānām iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:113: putra-kāmo yajeta svarga-kāmo yajeta ity evaṃ kāmopanibandhena vihitānāṃ putreṣṭi-jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:114: karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ svarūpeṇatyāgaṃ kavayaḥ paṇḍitāḥ sannyāsaṃ vidur na tu nityānām agnihotrādīnām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:115: teṣu vicakṣaṇās tu sarveṣāṃ kāmyānāṃ nityānāṃ ca karmaṇāṃ phala-tyāgam eva,
GE07bhg4c18u:116: na tu svarūpatas tyāgaṃ sannyāsa-lakṣaṇaṃ tyāgaṃ prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:117: nitya-karmaṇāṃ ca phalam asti - karmaṇāṃ pitṛ-loko dharmeṇa pāpam apanudati ity ādi śravaṇāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:120: putra-kāmo yajeta ity ādāv iva phala-viśeṣo na śrutayas tathāpi viśvajitā yajeta ity ādāv iva vidhiḥ kiñcit phalam ākṣiped eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:125: sarveṣāṃ karmaṇāṃ phalecchāṃ tyaktvānuṣṭhānaṃ khalu tyāga-śabdārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:126: pūrvokta-rītyā jñānodaya-phalasya sattvād apravṛtter duṣpariharatvaṃ pratyuktam //2//
GE07bhg4c18u:128: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:132: etad eva matāntara-nirāsena dṛḍhīkartuṃ mata-bhedaṃ darśayati tyājyam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:133: doṣavad dhiṃsādi-doṣakatvena kevalaṃ bandhakam iti hetoḥ sarveṣām api karma tyājyam iti eke sāṅkhyāḥ prāhur manīṣiṇa iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:134: asyāyaṃ bhāvaḥ - mā hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtānīti niṣedhaḥ puruṣasyānartha-hetur hiṃsā ity āha /
GE07bhg4c18u:135: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabhetety ādi-prākaraṇiko vidhis tu hiṃsāyāḥ kratūpakārakatvam āha /
GE07bhg4c18u:137: dravya-sādhyeṣu ca sarveṣv api karmasu hiṃsādeḥ sambhavāt sarvam api karma tyājyam eveti /
GE07bhg4c18u:138: tad uktaṃ - dṛṣṭavad ānuśravikaḥ sa hy aviśuddhi-kṣayātiśaya-yukta iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:146: apare tu mīmāṃsakā yajñādikaṃ karma na tyājyam iti prāhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:147: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ kratv-arthāpi satīyaṃ hiṃsā puruṣeṇa kartavyā /
GE07bhg4c18u:148: sā cānyoddeśenāpi kṛtā puruṣasya pratyavāya-hetur eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:149: yathā hi vidhir vidheyasya tad-uddeśyenānuṣṭhānaṃ vidhatte /
GE07bhg4c18u:151: na tv evaṃ niṣedho niṣedhasya tādarthyam apekṣate prāpti-mātrāpekṣitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:153: tad evaṃ samāna-viṣayakatvena sāmānya-śāstrasya viśeṣeṇa bādhān nāsti doṣavattvam /
GE07bhg4c18u:154: ato nityaṃ yajñādi-karma na tyājyam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:155: anena vidhi-niṣedhayoḥ samāna-balatā bādhyate sāmānya-viśeṣa-nyāyaṃ sampādayitum //3//
GE07bhg4c18u:156: Viśvanātha : tyāge punar api mata-bhedam upakṣipati tyājyam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:157: doṣavat hiṃsādi-doṣavattvāt karma svarūpata eva tyājyām ity eke sāṅkhyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:158: pare mīmāṃsakā yajñādikaṃ karma śāstre vihitatvān na tyājyam ity āhuḥ //3//
GE07bhg4c18u:159: Baladeva : tyāge punar api mata-bhedam āha tyājyam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:160: eke manīṣiṇo doṣavat na hiṃsyāt sarva-bhūtānīti śruti-nidarśinaḥ kāpilāḥ karma-doṣavat paśu-hiṃsādi-doṣa-yuktaṃ bhavaty atas tyājyaṃ svarūpato heyam ity āhuḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:161: agnīṣomīyaṃ paśum ālabheteti śrutis tu hiṃsāyāḥ kratv-aṅgatvam āha tv anartha-hetutvaṃ tasyā nivārayati /
GE07bhg4c18u:164: apare jaiminīyās tu yajñādikarma na tyājyaṃ tasya veda-vihitatvena nirdoṣatvād ity
GE07bhg4c18u:165: āhuḥ - yadyapi hiṃsānugrahātmakaṃ karma tathāpi tasya vedena dharmatvābhidhānān na
GE07bhg4c18u:167: na hiṃsyāt iti sāmānyato niṣedhas tu krator anyatra tasyāḥ pāpatām āheti na kiñcid avadyam //3//
GE07bhg4c18u:169: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama /
GE07bhg4c18u:171: Śrīdhara : evaṃ mata-bhedam upanyasya svamataṃ kathayitum āha niścayam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:172: tatraivaṃ vipratipanne tyāge niścayaṃ ye vacanāt śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c18u:173: tyāgasya loka-prasiddhatvāt kim atra śrotavym iti māvamaṃsthā ity āha he puruṣa-vyāghra puruṣa-śreṣṭha /
GE07bhg4c18u:175: hi yasmād ayaṃ karma-tyāgas tattvavidhbis tāmasādi-bhedena trividhaḥ samyag-vivekena prakīrtitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:176: traividhyaṃ ca niyatasya tu sannyāsaḥ karmaṇa ity ādinā vakṣyati //4//
GE07bhg4c18u:179: atra tyāgasya traividhyam uktramya niyatasya tu sannyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:181: iti tasya eva tāmasa-bhedaiḥ sannyāsa-śabda-prayogād bhagavan-mate tyāga-sannyāsa-śabdayor aikyārtham evety avagamyate //4//
GE07bhg4c18u:182: Baladeva : evaṃ mata-bhedam upavarṇya svamatam āha niścayam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:183: mata-bheda-graste tyāge me parameśvarasya sarvajñasya niścayaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c18u:184: nanu tyāgasya khyātatvāt tatra śrotavyaṃ kim asti /
GE07bhg4c18u:186: hi yatas tyāgas tāmasādi-bhedena vijñais trividhaḥ samprakīrtito vivicyoktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:187: tathā ca durbodho 'sau śrotavya iti tyāga-traividhyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:188: niyatasya tu ity ādibhir agre vācyam //4//
GE07bhg4c18u:190: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat /
GE07bhg4c18u:191: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām //5//
GE07bhg4c18u:192: Śrīdhara : prathamaṃ tāvan niścayam āha yajñeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:194: Viśvanātha : kāmyānām api madhye bhagavan-mate sāttvikāni yajña-dāna-tapāṃsi phalākāṅkṣā-rahitaiḥ kartavyānīty āha yajñādikaṃ kartavyam eva
GE07bhg4c18u:195: tatra hetuḥ pāvanānīti citta-śuddhikaratvād ity arthaḥ //5//
GE07bhg4c18u:196: Baladeva : prathamaṃ tasmin svaniścayam āha yajñeti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:197: yajñādīni manīṣiṇāṃ kāryāṇy eva na tyājyāni yad amūni viṣa-tantuvad antarabhyudita-jñāna-dvārā pāvanāni saṃsṛti-doṣa-vināśakāni bhavanti //5//
GE07bhg4c18u:199: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:200: kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam //6//
GE07bhg4c18u:201: Śrīdhara : yena prakāreṇa kṛtāny etāni pāvanāni bhavanti taṃ prakāraṃ darśayann āha etānīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:202: yāni yajñādīni karmāṇi mayā pāvanānīty uktam etāny apy eva kartavyāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:203: katham? saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārādhantayā kartavyānīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:204: phalāni ca tyaktvā kartavyāni iti ca me mataṃ niścitam /
GE07bhg4c18u:206: Viśvanātha : yena prakāreṇa kṛtāny etāni pāvanāni bhavanti taṃ prakāraṃ darśayati etāny apīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:208: phalābhisandhi-kartṛtvābhiniveśayos tyāga eva tyāgaḥ sannyāsaś cocyata ity bhāvaḥ //6//
GE07bhg4c18u:209: Baladeva : yajñādīnāṃ pāvanatā-prakāram āha etāny apīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:210: saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ phalāni ca pratipaoktāni pitṛ-lokādīni ca sarvāṇi tyaktvā kevalam īśvarārcana-dhiyā kartavyānīti me mayā niścitam ata uttamam idaṃ matam /
GE07bhg4c18u:215: Śrīdhara : pratijñātaṃ tyāgasya traividhyam idānīṃ darśayati niyatasyeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:217: niyatasya tu nityasya punaḥ karmaṇaḥ sannyāsas tyāgo nopapadyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:219: atas tasya parityāga upādeyatve 'pi tyājyam ity evaṃ lakṣaṇān mohād eva bhavet /
GE07bhg4c18u:220: sa ca mohasya tāmasatvāt tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //7//
GE07bhg4c18u:221: Viśvanātha : prakrāntasya trividha-tyāgasya tāmasaṃ bhedam āha niyatasya nityasya /
GE07bhg4c18u:224: nityasya tu karmaṇas tyāgo nopapadyate iti tu śabdārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:226: tāmasa iti tāmasa-tyāgasya phalam ajñāna-prāptir eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:228: Baladeva : pratijñātaṃ tyāga-traividhyam āha niyatasyeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:230: niyatasya nitya-naimittikasya mahā-yajñādeḥ karmaṇaḥ sannyāsas tyāgo nopapadyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:231: ātmoddeśād viśīrṇādivad antargata-jñānasya tasya mocakatvād dehayātrā-sādhakatvāc ca tat-tyāgo na yuktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:232: tena hi devatā-bhagavad-vibhūtir arcatāṃ tac-cheṣaiḥ pūtaiḥ siddhā deha-yātrā tattva-jñānāya sampadyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:233: vaiparītye pūrvam abhihitaṃ nityataṃ kuru karma tvam ity ādibhis tṛtīyae tasyāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:234: mohād bandhakam idam ity ajñānāt paritaḥ svarūpeṇa tyāgas tāmaso bhavati - mohasya
GE07bhg4c18u:237: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet /
GE07bhg4c18u:238: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet //8//
GE07bhg4c18u:239: Śrīdhara : rājasaṃ tyāgam āha duḥkham iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:240: yaḥ kartā ātma-bodhaṃ vinā kevalaṃ duḥkham ity evaṃ matvā śarīrāyāsa-bhayāt nityaṃ karma tyajet iti yat tādṛśas tyāgo rājaso duḥkhasya rājasatvāt
GE07bhg4c18u:241: atas taṃ rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ kṛtvā sa rājasaḥ puruṣas tyāgasya phalaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhā-lakṣaṇaṃ naiva labhata ity arthaḥ //8//
GE07bhg4c18u:243: yadyapi nitya-karmaṇām āvaśyakam eva tat-karaṇe guṇa eva na tu doṣa iti jānāmy eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:244: tad apii taiḥ śarīraṃ mayā kathaṃ vṛthā kleśayitavyam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:246: Baladeva : niṣkāmatayānuṣṭhitaṃ vihitaṃ karma muktihetur iti jānann api dravopyārjana-prātaḥ-snānādinā duḥkha-rūpam iti kāya-kleśa-bhayāc caitan mumukṣur api tyajet /
GE07bhg4c18u:248: taṃ tyāgaṃ kṛtvāpi janas tasya phalaṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ na labheta //8//
GE07bhg4c18u:250: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyaterjuna /
GE07bhg4c18u:251: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c18u:252: Śrīdhara : sāttvikaṃ tyāgam āha kāryam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:253: kāryam ity evaṃ niyatam avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma saṅgaṃ phalaṃ ca tyaktvā kriyate iti yat tādṛśas tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c18u:254: Viśvanātha : kāryam avaśya-kartavyam iti buddhyā niyataṃ nityaṃ karma,
GE07bhg4c18u:255: sāttvika iti tyāgāt tyāga-phalaṃ jñānaṃ sa labhetaiveti bhāvaḥ //9//
GE07bhg4c18u:256: Baladeva : kāryam avaśya-kartavyatayā vihitaṃ karma niyataṃ yathā bhavati,
GE07bhg4c18u:257: tathā saṅgaṃ kartṛtvābhiniveśaṃ phalaṃ ca nikhilaṃ tyaktvā kriyata iti yat sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikas tādṛśa-jñānasya sattva-dharmatvāt //9//
GE07bhg4c18u:259: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate /
GE07bhg4c18u:261: Śrīdhara : evambhūta-sāttvika-tyāga-pariniṣṭhitasya lakṣaṇam āha na dveṣṭīty ādi /
GE07bhg4c18u:263: akuśalaṃ duḥkhāvahaṃ śiśire prātaḥ-snānādikaṃ karma na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c18u:264: kuśale ca sukha-kare karmaṇi nidāghe madhyāhna-snānādau nānuṣajjate prītiṃ na karoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:266: yatra para-paribhavādi mahad api duḥkhaṃ sahate svargādi-sukhaṃ ca tyajati tatra kiyad etat tātkālikaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca ity evam anusandhānavān ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:267: ataeva chinnaḥ saṃśayo mithyā-jñānaṃ daihika-sukha-duḥkhayor upāditsā-parijihīrṣā-lakṣaṇaṃ yasya saḥ //10//
GE07bhg4c18u:268: Viśvanātha : evambhūta-sāttvika-tyāga-pariniṣṭhitasya lakṣaṇam āha na dveṣṭīty ādi /
GE07bhg4c18u:269: akuśalaṃ asukhadaṃ śīte prātaḥ-snānādikaṃ na dveṣṭi /
GE07bhg4c18u:273: kuśale sukhade nidāgha-madhyāhne snānādau na sajjate /
GE07bhg4c18u:274: yataḥ sattva-samāviṣṭo 'tidhāro medhāvī sthiradhīś chinno vihitāni karmāṇi kleśānuṣṭhitāni jñānaṃ janayeyur na vety evaṃ lakṣaṇaḥ saṃśayo yena saḥ //
GE07bhg4c18u:277: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:278: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate //11//
GE07bhg4c18u:279: Śrīdhara : nanv evambhutāt karma-phala-tyāgād varaṃ sarva-karma-tyāgaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:280: tathā sati karma-vikṣepābhāvena jñāna-niṣṭhā sukhaṃ sampadyate tatrāha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:281: deha-bhṛtā dehātmābhimānavatā niḥśeṣeṇa sarvāṇi karmāṇi tyaktuṃ na hi cākyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:282: tad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarma-kṛd ity ādinā /
GE07bhg4c18u:283: tasmād yas tu karmāṇi kurvann api karma-phala-tyāgī sa eva mukhas tyāgīty abhidhīyate //11//
GE07bhg4c18u:284: Viśvanātha : ito 'pi śāstrīyaṃ karma na tyājyam ity āha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:286: tad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarma-kṛd iti //11//
GE07bhg4c18u:287: Baladeva : nanv īdṛśāt phala-tyāgāt svarūpataḥ karma-tyāgo varīyān vikṣepābhāvena jñāna-niṣṭhā sādhakatvād iti cet tatrāha na hīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:288: deha-bhṛtā karmāṇy aśeṣatas tyaktuṃ na hi śakyaṃ na śakyāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:289: yad uktaṃ na hi kaścit kṣaṇam apītyādi /
GE07bhg4c18u:290: tasmād yaḥ karmāṇi kurvann eva tat-phala-tyāgo,
GE07bhg4c18u:292: tathā ca saniṣṭho 'dhikārī kartṛtvābhiniveśa-phalecchā-śūnyo yathā-śakti sarvāṇi karmāṇi jñānārthī san kuryād iti pārtha-sārather matam //11//
GE07bhg4c18u:294: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam /
GE07bhg4c18u:295: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit //12//
GE07bhg4c18u:296: Śrīdhara : evambhūtasya karma-phala-tyāgasya phalam āha aniṣṭam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:300: evaṃ trividhaṃ pāpasya puṇyasya cobhaya-miśrasya ca karmaṇo yat phalaṃ prasiddham /
GE07bhg4c18u:301: tat sarvam atyāgināṃ sakāmānām eva pretya paratra bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:303: na tu sannyāsināṃ kvacid api bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:305: anāśritaḥ karma-phalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:306: sa sannyāsī ca yogī cety evam ādau ca karma-phala-tyāgiṣu sannyāsi-śabda-yoga-darśanāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:307: teṣāṃ sāttvikānāṃ pāpāsambhavād īśvarārpaṇena ca puṇya-phalasya tyaktatvāt trividham api karma-phalaṃ na bhavatīty arthaḥ //12//
GE07bhg4c18u:308: Viśvanātha : evambhūta-tyāgābhāve doṣam āha - aniṣṭaṃ naraka-duḥkhaṃ iṣṭaṃ svarga-sukhaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:309: miśraṃ manuṣya-janmani sukha-duḥkham atyāgināṃ evambhūta-tyāga-rahitānām eva bhavati
GE07bhg4c18u:311: Baladeva : īdṛśa-tyāgābhāve doṣam āha aniṣṭam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:317: teṣāṃ tu karmāntargatena jñānena mokṣo bhavatīti tyāga-phalam uktam //12//
GE07bhg4c18u:321: Śrīdhara : nanu karma kurvataḥ karma-phalaṃ kathaṃ na bhaved ity āśaṅkya saṅga-tyāgino nirahaṅkārasya sataḥ karma-phalena lepo nāstīty upapādayitum āha pañceti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:322: sarva-karmaṇāṃ siddhaye niṣpattaya imāni vakṣyamāṇāni pañca-kāraṇāni me vacanān nibodha jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c18u:323: ātmanaḥ kartṛtvābhimāna-nivṛtty-artham avaśyam etāni jñātavyānīty evam /
GE07bhg4c18u:325: samyak khyāyate jñāyate paramātmā 'neneti sāṅkhyaṃ tattva-jñānam /
GE07bhg4c18u:327: tasmin kṛtaṃ karma tasyāntaḥ samāptir asminn iti sāṅkhyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:328: kṛto 'nto nirṇaye 'sminn iti kṛtāntaṃ sāṅkhya-śāstram eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:331: Viśvanātha : nanu karmakurvataḥ karma-phalaṃ kathaṃ na bhaved ity āśaṅkya nirahaṅkāratve sati karma-lepo nāstīty upapādayitum āha pañcamānīti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:332: sarva-karmaṇāṃ siddhaye niṣpattaya imāni pañca-kāraṇāni me mama vacanān nibodha jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c18u:333: samyak paramātmānaṃ khyāti kathayati iti saṅkhyam eva sāṅkhyaṃ vedānta-śāstraṃ tasmin /
GE07bhg4c18u:334: kīdṛśe kṛtaṃ karma tasyānto nāśo yasmāt tasmin proktāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:335: Baladeva : nanu karmāṇi kurvatāṃ tat-phalāni kuto na syur iti cet svasmin kartṛtvābhiniveśa-tyāgena
GE07bhg4c18u:336: parameśvare mukha-kartṛtva-niścayena bhavatīty āśayenāha pañcaitānīti pañcabhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:337: he mahābāho sarva-karmaṇāṃ siddhaye niṣpattaye etāni pañca-kāraṇāni me matto nibodha jānīhi /
GE07bhg4c18u:339: sāṅkhyaṃ jñānaṃ tat-pratipādakaṃ vedānta-śāstram sāṅkhyaṃ tasmin /
GE07bhg4c18u:340: kīdṛśīty āha kṛtānte kṛta-nirṇaye sarveṣāṃ karma-hetūnāṃ pravartakaḥ paramātmeti nirṇaya-kāriṇīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:344: vakṣyate ca īśvaraḥ sarva-bhūtānām (Gītā 18.61) ity ādi //
GE07bhg4c18u:346: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham /
GE07bhg4c18u:347: vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam //14//
GE07bhg4c18u:365: adhiṣṭhīyate jīvenety adhiṣṭhānaṃ śarīraṃ kartā jīvaḥ asya jñātṛtva-kartṛtve śrutir āha eṣa hi draṣṭā sraṣṭā ity (PraśnaU 4.9) ādinā /
GE07bhg4c18u:367: iti kartā śāstrārthavattvāt (Vs 2.3.26) ity ādi ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:370: vividhā ca pṛthak-ceṣṭā prāṇāpānādīnāṃ nānā-vidhā pṛthag-vyāpārāḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:371: daivaṃ cety atra karma-niṣpādake hetu-pracaye daivaṃ sarvārādhyaṃ paraṃ brahma pañcamam /
GE07bhg4c18u:372: karma-niṣpattāv antaryāmī harir mukhyo hetur ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:373: dehendriya-prāṇa-jīvopakaraṇo 'sau karma-pravartaka iti niścayavatāṃ karma tat-phaleṣu kartṛtvābhiniveśa-spṛhā-virahitānāṃ karmāṇi na bandhakānīti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:374: nanu jīvasya kartṛtve pareśāyatte sati tasya karma sva-niyojyatvāpattiḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:377: svadhiyā pravartituṃ na śakto niyojyo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:378: ucyate -- pareśena dattair dehendriyādibhis tenaivāhita-śaktibhis tad-ādhāra-bhūto
GE07bhg4c18u:379: jīvas tad-āhita-śaktibhis tad-ādhāra-bhūto jīvas tad-āhita-śaktikaḥ san karma-siddhaye
GE07bhg4c18u:381: pareśas tu tat-sarvāntaḥ-sthas tasminn anumatiṃ dadānas taṃ prerayatīti jīvasya sva-dhiyā pravṛtti-nivṛttimattvam astīti na kiñcic codyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:382: evam eva sūtrakāro niṛṇītavān parāt tat tac chakteḥ (?
GE07bhg4c18u:384: nanu muktasya jīvasya kartṛtvaṃ na syāt,
GE07bhg4c18u:385: tasya dehendriya-prāṇānāṃ vigamād iti cen na,
GE07bhg4c18u:389: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ //15//
GE07bhg4c18u:390: Śrīdhara: eteṣām eva sarva-karma-hetutvam āha śarīreti /
GE07bhg4c18u:391: yathoktaiḥ pañcabhiḥ prārabhyamānaṃ karma triṣv evāntarbhāvyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:392: śarīra-vāṅ-manobhir ity uktaṃ śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ca trividhaṃ karmeti prasiddheḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:393: śarīrādibhiḥ yat karma dharmyam adharmyaṃ vā karoti naras tasya karmaṇa ete pañca hetavaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:394: Viśvanātha : śarīrādibhir iti śārīraṃ vācikaṃ mānasaṃ ceti karma trividham /
GE07bhg4c18u:401: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:402: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ //16//
GE07bhg4c18u:405: tatra sarvasmin karmaṇi ete pañca hetava iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:406: evaṃ sati kevalaṃ nirupādhim asaṅgam ātmānaṃ tu yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati śāstrācāryopadeśābhyām asaṃskṛta-buddhitvād durmatir asau samyak na paśyati
GE07bhg4c18u:409: tatra sarvasmin karmaṇi ete pañcaiva hetava ity evaṃ sati kevalaṃ vastutaḥ niḥsaṅgam evātmānaṃ jīvaṃ yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati,
GE07bhg4c18u:415: evaṃ sati jīvasya kartṛtve pareśānumati-pūrvake tad-datta-dehādi-sāpekṣe ca sati,
GE07bhg4c18u:416: tatra karmaṇi kevalam evātmānaṃ jīvam eva yaḥ kartāraṃ paśyati /
GE07bhg4c18u:417: sa durmatir akṛta-buddhitvād alabdha-jñānatvān na paśyati yathāndhaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:419: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:420: hatvā.api sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate //17//
GE07bhg4c18u:421: Śrīdhara: kas tarhi sumatir yasya karma-lepo nāstīty uktam ity apekṣāyām āha - yasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:422: aham iti kṛto 'haṃ kartā ity evambhūto bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:426: ataeva yasya buddhir na lipyate iṣṭāniṣṭa-buddhyā karmasu na sajjate /
GE07bhg4c18u:427: na evambhūto dehādi-vyatiriktātma-darśī imān lokān sarvān api prāṇino loka-dṛṣṭyā hatvāpi viviktatayā sva-dṛṣṭyā na hanti,
GE07bhg4c18u:428: na tat-phalair nibadhyate bandhaṃ na prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:429: kiṃ punaḥ sattva-śuddhi-dvārā parokṣa-jñānotpatti-hetubhiḥ karmabhis tasya baddha-śaṅkety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:430: tad uktaṃ - brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:431: lipyate na sa pāpena padma-patram ivāmbhasā // (Gītā 5.10)
GE07bhg4c18u:432: Viśvanātha : kas tarhi sumatiś cakṣuṣmān ity ata āha yasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:433: ahaṅkṛto ahaṅkārasya bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ kartṛtvābhiniveśo yasya nāsti ataeva yasya buddhir na lipyate iṣṭāniṣṭa-buddhyā karmasu nāsajjati,
GE07bhg4c18u:434: sa hi karma-phalaṃ na prāpnotīti kiṃ kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:435: sa hi karma bhadrābhadraṃ kurvann api naiva karotīty āha hatvāpīti,
GE07bhg4c18u:436: sa imān sarvān api prāṇino loka-dṛṣṭyā hatvāpi sva-dṛṣṭyā naiva hanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:438: ato na badhyate karma-phalaṃ na prāpnotīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:439: Baladeva : kas tarhi cakṣuṣmān sumatis tatrāha yasyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:440: yasya puruṣasya manovṛtti-lakṣaṇo bhāvo nāhaṅkṛtaḥ sva-kartṛtve pareśāyatte 'nusandhite sati karmāṇy aham eva karomīty abhimāna-kṛto na bhavet
GE07bhg4c18u:441: yasya ca buddhir na lipyate karma-phala-spṛhayā,
GE07bhg4c18u:442: sa imāṅl lokān na kevalaṃ bhīṣmādīn hatvāpi na hanti,
GE07bhg4c18u:443: na ca tena sarva-loka-hananena karmaṇā nibadhyate lipyate // 17 //
GE07bhg4c18u:447: Śrīdhara: hatvāpi na hanti na nibadhyate ity etad evopapādayituṃ karma-codanāyāḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:448: karmāśrayasya ca karma-phalādīnāṃ ca triguṇātmakatvān nirguṇasyātmanas tat-sambandho
GE07bhg4c18u:449: nāstīty abhiprāyeṇa karma-codanāṃ karmāśrayaṃ cāha - jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:457: tad uktaṃ bhaṭṭaiḥ - codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:458: tataś cāyam arthaḥ ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ jñānādi-trayam avalambhya karma-vidhiḥ pravartate iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:466: sampradānādi kāraka-trayaṃ tu parasparayā kriyā-pravartakam eva kevalam /
GE07bhg4c18u:468: ataḥ karaṇādi-trayam eva kriyāśraya ity uktam //
GE07bhg4c18u:469: Viśvanātha : tad evaṃ bhagavan-mata ukta-lakṣaṇaḥ sāttvikas tyāga eva sannyāso jñāninām,
GE07bhg4c18u:475: māṃ bhajet sa ca sattamaḥ // (BhP 11.11.37) iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:476: asyārthaḥ svāmi-caraṇair vyākhyāto yathā - mayā veda-rūpeṇādiṣṭān api svadharmān santyajya yo māṃ bhajet sa ca sattama iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:478: na dharmācaraṇe sattva-śuddhyādīn guṇān vipakṣe doṣān pratyavāyāṃś cājñāya jñātvāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:479: mad-dhyāna-vikṣepatayā mad-bhaktyaiva sarvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dṛḍha-niścayenaiva dharmān santyajya ity
GE07bhg4c18u:480: atra dharmān dharma-phalāni santyajyeti tu vyākhyā na ghaṭate /
GE07bhg4c18u:481: na hi dharma-phala-tyāge kaścid atra pratyavāyo bhaved ity avadheyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:482: ayaṃ bhāvo bhagavad-vākyānāṃ tad-vyākhyātṝṇāṃ ca - jñānaṃ hi citta-śuddhim avaśyam evāpekṣate,
GE07bhg4c18u:483: niṣkāma-karmabhiś citta-śuddhi-tāratamye vṛtte eva jñānodaya-tāratamyaṃ bhaven nānyathā /
GE07bhg4c18u:484: ataeva samyag jñānodaya-siddhy-arthaṃ sannyāsibhir api niṣkāma-karma na kartavyam eva / yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c18u:493: bhaktis tu paramā svatantrā mahā-prabalā citta-śuddhiṃ naivāpekṣate, yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c18u:497: hṛd-rogam āśv apahinoty acireṇa dhīraḥ // (BhP 10.33.42) iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:498: atra tv ātma-pratyayeṇa hṛd-rogavattve vādhikāriṇi paramāyā bhakter api prathamam eva praveśas tatas tatraiva kāmādīnām apagamaś ca / tathā
GE07bhg4c18u:503: iti ca ity ato bhaktyaiva yadi tādṛśī citta-śuddhiḥ syāt,
GE07bhg4c18u:504: tadā bhaktaiḥ kathaṃ karma kartavyam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:505: atha prakṛam anusarāmaḥ - kiṃ ca na kevalaṃ dehādi-vyātiriktasyātmanaḥ jñānam eva jñānam,
GE07bhg4c18u:509: tad api sannyāsibhir jñeyam ity āha jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:511: yad uktaṃ bhaṭṭaiḥ - codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:512: uktaṃ ślokārdhaṃ svayam eva vyācaṣṭe karaṇam iti yaj jñānaṃ tat karaṇa-kārakam /
GE07bhg4c18u:516: yas tasya parijñātā sa kartā iti trividhaḥ karaṇaṃ karma kartā iti trividhaṃ kārakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:517: karma-saṅgrahaḥ karmaṇā niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhānenaiva saṅgṛhyata iti karma-codanā pada-vyākhyā /
GE07bhg4c18u:518: jñānatvaṃ jñeyatvaṃ jñātṛtvaṃ caitat trayaṃ niṣkāma-karmānuṣṭhāna-mūlakam iti bhāvaḥ //18-19//
GE07bhg4c18u:520: tac ca saniṣṭhena karmaṭhena bodhyam iti upadiśati jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:521: jñānaṃ jñeyam parijñātety evaṃ trika-yuktā karma-codanā jyotiṣṭomādi-karma-vidhiḥ codanā copadeśaś ca vidhiś caikārtha-vācina ity abhiyuktokteḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:522: tat trikaṃ svayam eva vyākhyāti karaṇam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:523: yaj jñānaṃ tat karaṇaṃ jñāyate 'nena iti nirukteḥ karaṇa-kārakam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:527: evaṃ karma-saṅgraho jyotiṣṭomādi karma-vidhis trividhaḥ karaṇādi-kāraka-traya-sādhyaś codanā-saṅgraha-śabdayor aikyārthaḥ // 18 //
GE07bhg4c18u:529: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:530: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api //19//
GE07bhg4c18u:533: guṇāḥ samyak kārya-bhedena khyāyate pratipādyante 'sminn iti guṇa-saṅkhyānaṃ sāṅkhya-śāstram /
GE07bhg4c18u:534: tasmin jñānaṃ ca karma ca kartā ca pratyekaṃ sattvādi-guṇa-bhedena tridhaivocyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:535: tāny api jñānādīni vakṣyamāṇāni yathāvat śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c18u:536: tridhaivety eva-kāro guṇa-trayopādhi-vyatirekeṇātmanaḥ svataḥ karmāṇi pratiṣedhārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:537: caturdeśe 'dhyāye tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvād ity ādinā guṇānāṃ bandhakatva-prakāro nirūpitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:538: saptadaśe 'dhyāye yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādinā guṇa-kṛta-trividha-svabhāva-nirūpaṇena
GE07bhg4c18u:539: rajas-tamaḥ-svabhāvaṃ parityajya sāttvikāhārādi-sevayā sāttvikaḥ svabhāvaḥ sampādanīya ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:540: iha tu kriyā-kāraka-phalādīnām ātma-sambandho nāstīti darśayituṃ sarveṣāṃ triguṇātmakatvam ucyate iti viśeṣo
GE07bhg4c18u:542: Baladevaḥ - jñānam iti guṇa-saṅkhyāne guṇa-nirūpake śāstre caturdaśe tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvād ity ādinā guṇānāṃ bandhakatā-prakāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:543: saptadaśe yajante sāttvikā devān ity ādinā guṇa-kṛta-svabhāva-bhedaś coktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:544: iha tu guṇa-saṃjñānāṃ jñānādīnāṃ traividhyam ucyata iti bodhyam //19//
GE07bhg4c18u:547: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam //20//
GE07bhg4c18u:548: Śrīdharaḥ - tatra jñānasya sāttvikādi-traividhyam āha sarva-bhūteṣv iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:549: sarveṣu bhūteṣu brahmādi-sthāvarās teṣu vibhakteṣu parasparaṃ vyavṛtteṣv avibhaktam
GE07bhg4c18u:550: anusyutam ekam avyayaṃ nirvikāraṃ bhāvaṃ paramātma-tattvaṃ yena jñānenekṣata ālocayati
GE07bhg4c18u:552: Viśvanāthaḥ - sāttvikaṃ jñānam āha -- sarva-bhūteṣv iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:553: ekaṃ bhāvam ekam eva jīvātmānaṃ nānā-vidha-phala-bhogārthaṃ krameṇa sarva-bhūteṣu
GE07bhg4c18u:554: manuṣya-deva-tiryag-ādiṣu vartamānam avyayaṃ naśvareṣv api teṣv anaśvaraṃ vibhakteṣu
GE07bhg4c18u:555: parasparaṃ vibhinneṣv apy avibhaktam eka-rūpaṃ yena karma-sambandhinā jñānenekṣate
GE07bhg4c18u:558: sarva-bhūteṣu deva-manuṣyādiṣu deheṣu nānā-karma-phala-bhogāt krameṇa vartamāna-bhāvaṃ jīvātmānaṃ yenaikaṃ vīkṣyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:559: avyayaṃ naśvareṣu teṣv anaśvaraṃ vibhakteṣu mitho-bhinneṣu teṣv avibhaktam eka-rūpaṃ ca yena taṃ vīkṣyate taj jñānaṃ sāttvikam aupaniṣad-aviviktātma-jñānaṃ tad ity arthaḥ //20//
GE07bhg4c18u:561: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
GE07bhg4c18u:562: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam //21//
GE07bhg4c18u:564: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānam ity asyaiva vivaraṇam /
GE07bhg4c18u:565: sarveṣu bhūteṣu nānā-bhāvān vastuta evānekān kṣetrajñān pṛthag-vidhān sukhitva-duḥkhitvādi-rūpeṇa vilakṣaṇān yena jñānena vetti taj jñānaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi //21//
GE07bhg4c18u:566: Viśvanātha : rājasaṃ jñānam āha sarva-bhūteṣu jīvātmanaḥ pṛthaktvena yaj jñānam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:567: deha-nāśa evātmano nāśa ity asurāṇāṃ matam /
GE07bhg4c18u:568: ataeva pṛthak pṛthag deheṣu pṛthak pṛthag evātmeti tathā śāstra-karaṇāt pṛthag-vidhān nānābhāvān nānābhiprāyān /
GE07bhg4c18u:570: sukha-duḥkhādyanāśraya itii jaḍa iti cetana iti vyāpaka iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:572: aneka iti ityādi kalpān yena eka ityādi veda tad rājasam //21//
GE07bhg4c18u:574: sarveṣu bhūteṣu deva-manuṣyādi-deheṣu jīvātmanaḥ pṛthaktvena yaj jñānaṃ deha-vināśa evātma-vināśa iti yaj jñānam ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:575: yena ca nānā-vidhān bhāvān abhiprāyān vetti /
GE07bhg4c18u:576: deha evātmeti dehād anyo deha-parimāṇa ātmeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:578: dehād anyo nava-viśeṣa-guṇāśrayo 'jaḍo vibhur ātmety evaṃ lokāyatika-jaina-bauddha-māyi-tārkikādi-vādān yena jānāti tad rājasaṃ jñānam //21//
GE07bhg4c18u:580: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahetukam /
GE07bhg4c18u:581: atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam //22//
GE07bhg4c18u:582: Śrīdhara : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yad iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:583: ekasmin kārye dehe pratimādau yā kṛtsnavat paripūrṇavat sattama etāvān eva ātmeśvaro yā ity abhiniveśa-yuktam ahaitukaṃ nirupapattikaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:588: yad evambhūtaṃ jñānaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam //22//
GE07bhg4c18u:589: Viśvanātha : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yat tu jñānam ahaitukam autpattikam eva ataeva ekasmin kārye laukika eva snāna-bhojana-pāna-strī-sambhoge tat-sādhane ca karmaṇi saktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:591: ataevātattvārthavat tatra tattva-rūpo 'rthaḥ ko 'pi nāstīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:592: alpaṃ paśūnām iva yat kṣudraṃ tat tāmasaṃ jñānam /
GE07bhg4c18u:596: Baladeva : tāmasaṃ jñānam āha yat tv iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:597: yat tu jñānam ahaitukaṃ svābhāvikaṃ na tu śāstrād dhetor jñānam /
GE07bhg4c18u:599: na tu vaidike yāga-dānādau saktaṃ kṛtsnavat pūrṇaṃ nāto 'dhikam astīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:601: alpaṃ paśv-ādi-sādhāraṇyāt tucchaṃ tal laukika-snāna-bhojanādi-jñānaṃ tāmasam //22//
GE07bhg4c18u:604: aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate //23//
GE07bhg4c18u:605: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ trividhaṃ karmāha - niyatam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:608: arāga-dveṣataḥ putrādi-prītyā vāśatru-dveṣeṇa vā yat kṛtaṃ na bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:610: tad-vilakṣaṇena niṣkāmeṇa kartrā yat kṛtaṃ karma tat sāttvikam ucyate //23//
GE07bhg4c18u:611: Viśvanātha: trividhaṃ jñānam uktvā trividhaṃ karmāha - niyataṃ nityatayā vihitaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:612: saṅga-rahitam abhiniveśa-śūnyam ataevārāga-dveṣato rāga-dveṣābhyāṃ vinaiva kṛtam
GE07bhg4c18u:613: aphalepsunā phalākāṅkṣā-rahitenaiva kartrā kṛtaṃ karma yat sāttvikam //23 //
GE07bhg4c18u:614: Baladevaḥ: atha karma-traividhyam āha - niyatam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:617: arāga-dveṣataḥ kṛtaṃ kīrtau rāgād akīrtau dveṣāc ca yan na kṛtaṃ,
GE07bhg4c18u:618: kintv īśvarārcanatayivāphala-prepsunā phalecchā-śūnyena yat karma kṛtaṃ tat sāttvikam //23//
GE07bhg4c18u:620: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:623: yat tu karma kāmepsunā phalaṃ prāptum icchatā sāhaṅkāreṇa mat-samaḥ[*ENDNOTE] ko 'nyaḥ śrotriyo 'stīty evaṃ nirūḍhāhaṅkāra-yuktena ca kriyate
GE07bhg4c18u:624: yac ca punar bahulāyāsam atikleśa-yuktaṃ tat karma rājasam udāhṛtam //24//
GE07bhg4c18u:627: Baladevaḥ: yat kāmepsunā phalākāṅkṣiṇā sāhaṅkāreṇa kartṛtvābhiniveśinā janena bahulāyāsam atikleśa-yuktaṃ karma kriyate tad rājasam //24//
GE07bhg4c18u:629: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam /
GE07bhg4c18u:630: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate //25//
GE07bhg4c18u:635: pauruṣaṃ ca sva-sāmarthyam anapekṣyāparyālocya kevalaṃ mohād eva yat karmārabhyate tat tāmasam ucyate //25//
GE07bhg4c18u:636: Viśvanātha: anu karmānuṣṭhānānantaram āyatyāṃ bhāvinaṃ bandhaṃ rāja-dasyu-yama-dūtādibhir bandhanaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:638: hiṃsāṃ svasya nāśaṃ ca anapekṣyāparyālocya pauruṣaṃ vyavahārika-puruṣa-mātra-kartavyaṃ karma mohād ajñānād eva yad ārabhyate tat tāmasam //25//
GE07bhg4c18u:642: pauruṣaṃ sabalaṃ cānavekṣya yat karma mohād ārabhyate tat tāmasam //25//
GE07bhg4c18u:646: Śrīdhara: kartāraṃ trividham āha mukta-saṅga iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:652: ārabdhasya karmaṇaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca nirvikāro harṣa-viṣāda-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:656: Baladevaḥ: atha kartṛ-traividhyam āha mukteti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:661: ānuṣaṅgika-phalasya siddhāv asiddhau ca nirvikāro sukhena duḥkhena ca rahitaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:671: lābhālābhayor harṣa-śokābhyām anvitaḥ saṃyuktaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ //27//
GE07bhg4c18u:682: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate //28//
GE07bhg4c18u:683: Śrīdhara: tāmasaṃ kartāram āha ayukta iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:690: dīrgha-sūtrī ca kartavyānāṃ dīrgha-prasāraṇaḥ sarvadā manda-svabhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:691: yad adya śvo vā kartavyaṃ tan māsenāpi na karoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:692: yaś caivambhūtaḥ sa kartā tāmasa ucyate //28//
GE07bhg4c18u:693: kartṛ-traividhyenaiva jñātur api traividhyam uktaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:694: karma-traividhyena ca jñeyasyāpi traividhyam uktaṃ jñātavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:695: buddhes traividhyena karaṇasyāpi traividhyam uktaṃ bhaviṣyati //28//
GE07bhg4c18u:696: Viśvanāthaḥ - ayukto 'naucitya-kārī prākṛtaḥ prakṛtau sva-svabhāva eva vartamānaḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:697: yad eva sva-manasi āyāti tad evānutiṣṭhati,
GE07bhg4c18u:698: na tu guror api vacaḥ pramāṇayatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:700: tad evaṃ jñānibhir ukta-lakṣaṇaḥ sāttvika eva tyāgaḥ kartavyaḥ sāttvikam eva karma-niṣṭhaṃ jñānam āśrayaṇīyaṃ sāttvikam eva karma kartavyaṃ sāttvikenaiva kartrā bhavitavyaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:701: eṣa eva sannyāso jñāninām iti me jñānaṃ prakaraṇārtha-niṣkarṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:702: bhaktānāṃ tu triguṇātītam eva jñānaṃ triguṇātītaṃ me karma bhakti-yogākhyaṃ triguṇātītā eva kartāraḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:714: kiṃ ca na kevalam etat trikam eva bhakti-mate guṇātītam api tu bhakti-sambandhi sarvam eva guṇātītam /
GE07bhg4c18u:728: tad evaṃ guṇātītānāṃ bhaktānāṃ bhakti-sambandhīni jñāna-karma-śraddhādau sva-sukhādīni sarvāṇy eva guṇātītāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:729: sāttvikānāṃ jñānināṃ jñāna-sambandhīni tāni sarvāṇi sāttvikāny eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:730: rājasānāṃ karmiṇāṃ tāni sarvāṇi rājasāny eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:731: tāmasānām ucchṛṅkhalānāṃ tāni sarvāṇi tāmasāny eveti śrī-gītā-bhāgavatārtha-dṛṣṭyā jñeyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:732: jñāninām api punar antima-daśāyāṃ jñāna-sannyāsānantaram urvaritayā kevalayā bhaktyaiva guṇātītatvaṃ caturdaśādhyāya uktam //28//
GE07bhg4c18u:735: na tu śāstrānusāreṇa karma-kṛd ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:740: dīrgha-sūtrī divasaika-kartavyaṃ varṣeṇāpi yo na karoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:743: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c18u:745: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ buddher dhṛteś ca traividhyaṃ pratijānīte buddher bhedam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:747: Viśvanātha: jñānibhiḥ sarvam api vastu sāttvikam evopādeyam iti jñāpayituṃ buddhy-ādīnām api traividhyam āha buddher iti //29//
GE07bhg4c18u:748: Baladeva: evaṃ jñāna-jñeya-parijñātṝṇāṃ traividhyam uktvā buddhi-dhṛtyos tad vaktuṃ pratijānīte buddher iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:751: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye /
GE07bhg4c18u:752: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī //30//
GE07bhg4c18u:753: Śrīdhara: atra buddhes traividhyam āha pravṛttiṃ ceti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:756: yasmin deśe kāle ca yat kāryam akāryaṃ ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:758: kathaṃ bandhaḥ kathaṃ vā mokṣe iti yā buddhir antaṃkaraṇaṃ vetti sā sāttvikī /
GE07bhg4c18u:759: yayā pumān vettīti vaktavye karaṇe kartṛtvopacāraḥ kāṣṭhāni pacantītivat //30//
GE07bhg4c18u:761: Baladeva: tatra buddhes traividhyam āha pravṛttiṃ ceti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:762: yā buddhir dharme pravṛttim adharmān nivṛttiṃ ca vetti,
GE07bhg4c18u:763: yayā vettīti vaktavya yā vettīti karaṇe kartṛtvam upacaritam /
GE07bhg4c18u:765: niṣkāmaṃ karma kāryaṃ sa-kāmaṃ tv akāryam iti kāryākārye yā vetti aśāstrīya-pravṛttito bhayaṃ śāstrīya-pravṛttitas tv abhayam iti bhayābhaye yā vetti,
GE07bhg4c18u:766: bandhaṃ saṃsāra-yāthātmyaṃ mokṣaṃ tac-cheda-yāthāmyaṃ ca yā vetti sā buddhiḥ sāttvikī //30//
GE07bhg4c18u:768: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:769: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī //31//
GE07bhg4c18u:777: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā /
GE07bhg4c18u:778: sarvārthān viparītāñś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī //32//
GE07bhg4c18u:779: Śrīdhara: tāmasīṃ buddhim āha adharmam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:784: yad vā antaḥkaraṇasya dharmiṇo buddhir apy adhyavasāya-lakṣaṇā vṛttir eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:785: icchā-dveṣādīnāṃ tad-vṛttīnāṃ bahutve 'pi dharmādharma-bhayābhaya-sādhanatvena prādhānyād etāsāṃ traividhyam uktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:788: kuṭhāraś chinattītivat yayā manyata ity arthaḥ //32//
GE07bhg4c18u:789: Baladevaḥ : tāmasīṃ buddhim āha adharmam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:791: sarvārthān viparītāni sādhum asādhum asādhuṃ ca sādhuṃ,
GE07bhg4c18u:792: paraṃ tattvam aparam aparaṃ ca tattvaṃ param ity evaṃ sarvān arthān viparītān manyata ity arthaḥ //32//
GE07bhg4c18u:796: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ dhṛtes traividhyam āha dhṛtyeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:797: yogena cittaigāgreṇa hetunā 'vyabhicāriṇyā viṣayāntaram adhārayantyā yayā dhṛtyā manasaḥ prāṇānām indriyāṇāṃ ca kriyā dhārayate niyacchati sā dhṛtiḥ sāttvikī //33//
GE07bhg4c18u:799: Baladevaḥ : dhṛtes traividhyam āha dhṛtyeti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:800: yayā manaḥ-prāṇendriyāṇāṃ yogopāya-bhūtāḥ kriyāḥ puruṣo dhārayate,
GE07bhg4c18u:803: yogaḥ parātma-cintanaṃ tenāvyabhicāriṇyā tad anyaṃ viṣayam agṛhṇantyety arthaḥ //33//
GE07bhg4c18u:806: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī //34//
GE07bhg4c18u:807: Śrīdhara: rājasīṃ dhṛtim āha yayā tv iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:808: yayā tu dhṛtyā dharmārtha-kāmān prādhānyena dhārayate na vimuñcati /
GE07bhg4c18u:809: tat-saṅgena phalākāṅkṣī ca bhavati sā rājasī dhṛtiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:815: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:816: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī //35//
GE07bhg4c18u:817: Śrīdhara : tāmasīṃ dhṛtim āha yayeti duṣṭāviveka-bahulā medhā yasya sa durmedhāḥ puruṣo yayā dhṛtyā svapnādīn na vimuñcati punaḥ punar āvartayati
GE07bhg4c18u:820: Baladevaḥ : yayā svapnādīn na vimuñcati durmedhās tān dhārayaty eva,
GE07bhg4c18u:824: svapnādi-śabdais tad-dhetu-bhūtā manaḥ-prāṇendriya-kriyā yayā dhārayate sā tāmasī dhṛtir ity arthaḥ //35//
GE07bhg4c18u:826: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha /
GE07bhg4c18u:827: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchhati //36//
GE07bhg4c18u:830: Śrīdhara: idānīṃ sukhasya traividhyaṃ pratijānīte 'rdhena sukham iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:832: tatra sāttvikaṃ sukham āha abhyāsād iti sārdhena /
GE07bhg4c18u:833: yatra yasmiṃś ca sukhe 'bhyāsād atiparicayād ramate /
GE07bhg4c18u:834: na tu viṣaya-sukha iva sahasā ratiṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:835: yasmin ramamāṇaś ca duḥkhasyāntam avasānaṃ nitarāṃ gacchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:837: yat tat kim apy agre prathamaṃ viṣam iva manaḥ-saṃyamādhīnatvād duḥkhāvaham iva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:841: tato jātaṃ yat sukhaṃ tat sāttvikaṃ proktaṃ yogibhiḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c18u:842: Viśvanātha - sāttvikaṃ sukham āha sārdhena abhyāsāt punar anuśīlanād eva ramate,
GE07bhg4c18u:843: na tu viṣayeṣv ivotpattyaiva ramata ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:844: duḥkhāntaṃ nigacchati yasmin ramamāṇaḥ saṃsāra-duḥkhaṃ taratīty arthaḥ // 36//
GE07bhg4c18u:845: viṣam iveti indriya-mano-nirodho hi prathamaṃ duḥkhada eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ //37//
GE07bhg4c18u:846: Baladevaḥ : atha sukha-traividhyaṃ pratījānīte sukhaṃ tv ity ardhakena /
GE07bhg4c18u:847: tatra sāttvikaṃ sukham āha abhyāsād iti sārdhakena /
GE07bhg4c18u:848: abhyāsāt punaḥ punaḥ pariśīlanād yatra ramate,
GE07bhg4c18u:850: yasmin ramamāṇo duḥkhāntaṃ nigacchati saṃsāraṃ tarati // 36//
GE07bhg4c18u:851: yac cāgre prathamaṃ viṣam iva manaḥ-saṃyama-kleśa-sattvād viviktātma-prakāśāc cātiduḥkhāvaham iva bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:852: pariṇāme samādhi-paripāke saty amṛtopamaṃ vivikātma-prakāśāt pīyūṣa-pravāha-nipātavad bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:853: yac cātma-sambandhinyā buddheḥ prasādāj jāyate tat sāttvikaṃ sukham /
GE07bhg4c18u:857: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam //38//
GE07bhg4c18u:858: Śrīdhara : rājasaṃ sukham āha viṣayeti viṣayāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogād yat tat prasiddhaṃ strī-saṃsargādi-sukham amṛtam upamā yasya tādṛśaṃ bhavaty agre prathamam /
GE07bhg4c18u:859: pariṇāme tu viṣa-tulyam ihāmutra ca duḥkha-hetutvāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:862: Baladeva : viṣayair yuvati-rūpa-sparśādibhiḥ sahendriyāṇāṃ cakṣus tv agādīnāṃ saṃyogāt
GE07bhg4c18u:863: sambandhāt yad agre pūrvam amṛtopamam atisvādu-pariṇāme 'vasāne tu niraya-hetutvād
GE07bhg4c18u:864: viṣopamam atiduḥkhāvahaṃ bhavati tad rājasaṃ sukham //38 //
GE07bhg4c18u:866: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:868: Śrīdhara : tāmasaṃ sukham āha yad iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:869: agre ca prathama-kṣaṇe 'nubandhe ca paścād api yat sukham ātmano moha-karam /
GE07bhg4c18u:870: tad evāha nidrā ālasyaṃ ca pramādaś ca kartavyārthāvadhāraṇa-rāhityena mano-grāhyam etebhya uttiṣṭhati yat sukhaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam //39//
GE07bhg4c18u:872: Baladeva : yad-agre 'nubhava-kāle anubandhe paścād vipāka-kāle cātmano mohanaṃ vastu-yāthātmyāvarakaṃ,
GE07bhg4c18u:873: yac ca nidrādibhya uttiṣṭhati jāyate tat tāmasaṃ sukham /
GE07bhg4c18u:877: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:878: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c18u:879: Śrīdhara : anuktam api saṅgṛhṇan prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:880: ebhiḥ prakṛti-sambhavaiḥ sattvādibhis tribhir guṇair muktaṃ prāṇi-jātam /
GE07bhg4c18u:882: pṛthivyāṃ manuṣya-lokādiṣudivi deveṣu ca kvāpi nāstīty arthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c18u:883: Viśvanātha : anuktam api saṅgṛhṇan prakaraṇārtham upasaṃharati neti tat sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātam
GE07bhg4c18u:884: anyac ca vastu-mātraṃ kvāpi nāsti yad ebhiḥ prakṛtijais tribhir guṇair muktaṃ rahitaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:885: syād ataḥ sarvam eva vastu-jātaṃ triguṇātmakaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:886: tatra sāttvikam evopādeyaṃ rājasa-tāmase tu nopādeya iti prakaraṇa-tātparyam //40//
GE07bhg4c18u:887: Baladevaḥ : prakaraṇārtham upasaṃhann anuktam api saṅgṛhṇāti na tad iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:888: pṛthivyāṃ manuṣyādiṣu divi svargādau deveṣu ca prakṛtiṃ saṃsṛṣṭeṣu brahmādi-stambānteṣv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:889: tat sattvaṃ prāṇi-jātam anyac ca vastu nāsti /
GE07bhg4c18u:890: yad ebhiḥ prakṛtijais tribhir guṇair muktaṃ virahitaṃ syāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:891: tathā ca triguṇātmakeṣu vastuṣu sāttvikasyaivopayogitvāt tad eva grāhyam anyat tu tyājyam iti prakaraṇārthaḥ //40//
GE07bhg4c18u:895: Śrīdhara : nanu ca yady evaṃ sarvam api kriyā-kāraka-phalādikaṃ prāṇi-jātaṃ ca triguṇātmakam
GE07bhg4c18u:896: eva tarhi katham asya mokṣa ity apekṣāyāṃ sva-svādhikāra-vihitaiḥ karmabhiḥ parameśvarārādhanāt
GE07bhg4c18u:897: tat-prasāda-labdha-jñānenety evaṃ sarva-gītārtha-sāraṃ saṅgṛhya pradarśayituṃ prakaraṇāntaram ārabhate /
GE07bhg4c18u:900: brāhmaṇānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ viśāṃ ca śūdrāṇāṃ ca karmāṇi pravibhaktāni prakarṣeṇa vibhāgato vihitāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:902: vibhāgopalakṣaṇam āha svabhāvaḥ sāttvikādiḥ prabhavati prādurbhavati yebhyas tair guṇair upakakṣaṇa-bhūtaiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:908: Viśvanātha : kiṃ ca triguṇātmakam api prāṇi-jātaṃ svādhikāra-prāptena vihita-karmaṇā parameśvaram ārādhya kṛtārthībhivatītyāha brāhmaṇeti ṣaḍbhiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:909: sva-bhāvenotpattyaiva prabhavanti prādurbhavanti ye guṇāḥ sattvādayas taiḥ prakarṣeṇa vibhaktāni pṛthak-kṛtāni karmāṇi brāhmaṇādīnāṃ vihitāni santīty arthaḥ //41//
GE07bhg4c18u:910: Baladeva : yadyapi sarvāṇi vastūni triguṇātmakāni tathāpi brāhmaṇādayaś cet sva-vihitāni
GE07bhg4c18u:911: karmāṇi bhagavad-ārādhana-bhāvenānutiṣṭheyus tadā tāni jñāna-niṣṭhām utpādya mocakāni
GE07bhg4c18u:912: bhavantiīti vaktuṃ prakaraṇam ārabhate brāhmaṇeti ṣaṭkena /
GE07bhg4c18u:914: brāhmaṇādīnāṃ caturṇāṃ karmāṇi svabhāv-prabhavair guṇaiḥ saha śāstreṇa pravibhaktāni,
GE07bhg4c18u:915: svabhāvaḥ prāktana-saṃskāras tasmāt prabhavanti ye guṇāḥ sattvādyās taiḥ saha śāstreṇa teṣāṃ karmāṇi vibhajyoktāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:916: evaṃ guṇaka-brāhmaṇādayas teṣām etāni karmāṇīti tatra sattva-pradhāno brāhmaṇaḥ praśāntatvāt sattvopasarjan-rajaḥ-pradhānaḥ kṣatriya īśvara-svabhāvatvāt,
GE07bhg4c18u:921: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:923: Śrīdhara : tatra brāhmaṇasya svābhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śama iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:933: yad uktaṃ svabhāva-prabhavair guṇaiḥ pravibhaktānīti tad evoktaṃ svabhāvajam iti //42//
GE07bhg4c18u:934: Viśvanātha : tatra sattva-pradhānānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ svabhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śama iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:936: damo bāhyendriya-nigrahas tapaḥ śarīrādi jñāna-vijñāne śāstrānubhavotthe āstikyaṃ śāstrārthe dṛḍha-viśvāsa evam ādi brahma-karma brāhmaṇasya karma svabhāvajaṃ svābhāvikam //42//
GE07bhg4c18u:937: Baladeva : brāhmaṇasya svābhāvikaṃ karmāha śama iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:944: āstikyaṃ sarvaveda-vedyo harir nikhilaika-karaṇaṃ sva-vvihitaiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:945: kevalayā bhaktyā ca santoṣitaḥ sva-paryantaṃ sarvam arpayatīti śāstrādhigate 'rthe
GE07bhg4c18u:959: śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam /
GE07bhg4c18u:960: dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣātraṃ karma svabhāvajam //43//
GE07bhg4c18u:961: Śrīdhara: kṣatriyasya svābhāvikāni karmāṇy āha śauryam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:970: Viśvanātha: sattvopasarjana-rajaḥ-pradhānānāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ karmāha - śauryaṃ parākramaḥ tejaḥ prāgalbhyaṃ dhṛtir dhairyaṃ īśvara-bhāvo loka-niyantṛtvam
GE07bhg4c18u:992: gā raksatīti go-rakṣas tasya bhāvo gaurakṣyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:993: raja-upasarjana-tamaḥ-pradhānānāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ karmāha paricaryātmakaṃ brāhmaṇa-kṣatriya-viśāṃ paricaryā-rūpam //44//
GE07bhg4c18u:998: vṛddhau dhana-prayogaḥ kuśīdam apy atrāntargatam etat svabhāva-siddhaṃ vaiśya-karma /
GE07bhg4c18u:1000: brāhmaṇādīnāṃ dvijanmanāṃ paricaryā śūdrasya svābhāvikaṃ karma /
GE07bhg4c18u:1003: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1004: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu //45//
GE07bhg4c18u:1005: Śrīdhara: evambhūtasya brāhmaṇādi-karmaṇo jñāna-hetutvam āha sve sve iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1006: sva-svādhikāra-vihite karmaṇy abhirataḥ pariniṣṭhito naraḥ saṃsiddhiṃ jñāna-yogyatāṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1008: sva-karma-pariniṣṭhito yathā yena prakāreṇa tattva-jñānaṃ labhate tat prakāraṃ śṛṇu //45//
GE07bhg4c18u:1010: Baladevaḥ: uktānāṃ karmaṇāṃ jñāna-hetutām āha sve sve iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1011: sva-sva-varṇāśrama-vihite karmaṇy abhiratas tad-anuṣṭhātā naraḥ saṃsiddhiṃ viśa-tantuvat karmāntargataṃ jñāna-niṣṭhāṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1012: nanu bandhakena karmaṇāṃ vimocikā jñāna-niṣṭhā katham iti ced buddhi-viśeṣād ity āha sva-karmeti //45//
GE07bhg4c18u:1014: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1015: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c18u:1017: yato 'ntathāmiṇaḥ parameśvarād bhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ pravṛttiś ceṣṭā bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1018: yena ca kāraṇātmanā sarvam idaṃ viśvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1019: tam īśvaraṃ sva-karmaṇābhyarcya pūjayitvā siddhiṃ labhate manuṣyaḥ //46//
GE07bhg4c18u:1021: tam evābhyarcya ity anena karmaṇā parameśaras tuṣyatv iti manasā tad-arpaṇam eva tad-abhyarcanam //46//
GE07bhg4c18u:1023: yataḥ parameśvarād bhūtānāṃ janmādi-lakṣaṇā pravṛttir bhavati ,
GE07bhg4c18u:1024: yena cedaṃ sarvaṃ jagat taṃ vyāptaṃ tam indrādi-devatātmanāvasthitaṃ sva-vihitena
GE07bhg4c18u:1025: karmaṇābhyarcya etena karmaṇā sva-prabhus tuṣyatu iti manasā tasmiṃs tat samarpya
GE07bhg4c18u:1030: Śrīdhara: svakarmeti viśeṣaṇasya phalam āha śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1031: viguṇo 'pi sva-dharmaḥ samyag-anuṣṭhitād api para-dharmāt śreyān śreṣṭhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1032: na ca bandhu-vadhādi-muktād yuddhādeḥ svadharmād bhikṣāṭanādi para-dharmaḥ śreṣṭha iti mantavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1033: yataḥ svabhāvena pūrvoktena niyataṃ niyamenoktaṃ karma kurvan kilbiṣaṃ nāpnoti //47//
GE07bhg4c18u:1034: Viśvanātha: na ca kriyādibhiḥ sva-dharmaṃ rājasaṃ ca vīkṣya tatra anabhirucyā sāttvikaṃ karma kartavyam ity āha śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1035: para-dharmāt śreṣṭhād api svanuṣṭhitāt samyag anuṣṭhitād api svadharmo viguṇo nikṛṣṭo 'pi samyag-anuṣṭhātum aśakyo 'pi śreṣṭhaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1036: tena bandhu-vadhādi-doṣavattāt sva-dharmaṃ yuddhaṃ tyaktvā bhikṣāṭanādi-rūpa-para-dharmas tvayā nānusṭheya iti bhāvaḥ //47//
GE07bhg4c18u:1037: Baladevaḥ: nanu kṣatriyādi-dharmāṇāṃ rājasāditvāt teṣu ruci-śūnyaiḥ kṣatriyādibhiḥ sāttviko brahma-dharma evānuṣṭheya iti cet tatrāha śreyān iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1038: sva-dharmo viguṇaḥ nikṛṣṭo 'pi samyag-anuṣṭhito 'pi vā para-dharmād utkṛṣṭāt svanuṣṭhitāc ca śreyān atipraśasto vihitatvāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1040: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet /
GE07bhg4c18u:1042: Śrīdhara: yadi punaḥ sāṅkhya-dṛṣṭya sva-dharme hiṃsā-lakṣaṇaṃ doṣaṃ matvā para-dharmaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manyase tarhi sadoṣatvaṃ para-dharme 'pi tulyam ity āśayenāha sahajam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1043: sahajaṃ svabhāva-vihitaṃ karma sa-doṣam api na tyajet /
GE07bhg4c18u:1044: hi yasmāt sarve 'py ārambhāḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthāni sarvāṇy api karmāṇi doṣeṇa kenacid āvṛtā vyāptā eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1046: ato yathāgner dhūma-rūpaṃ doṣam apākṛtya pratāpa eva tamaḥ-śītādi-nivṛttaye sevyate tathā karmaṇo 'pi doṣāṃśaṃ vihāya guṇāṃśa eva sattva-śuddhaye sevyata ity arthaḥ //48//
GE07bhg4c18u:1047: Viśvanātha: na ca sva-dharme eva kevalaṃ doṣo 'stīti mantavyam,
GE07bhg4c18u:1048: yataḥ para-dharmeṣv api doṣaḥ kaścid asty evety āha sahajam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1049: sahajaṃ svabhāva-vihitaṃ hi yataḥ sarve 'py ārambhāḥ dṛṣṭādṛṣṭa-sādhanāni karmāṇi doṣeṇāvṛtā eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1050: yathā dhūmena doṣeṇāvṛta eva vahnir dṛśyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1051: ato dhūma-rūpaṃ doṣam apākṛtya tasya tāpa eva tamaḥ-śītādi-nivṛttaye yathā sevyate tathā karmaṇo 'pi doṣāṃśaṃ vihāya guṇāṃśa eva sattva-śuddhaye sevya ity bhāvaḥ //48//
GE07bhg4c18u:1052: Baladevaḥ: na khalu kṣatriyādi-dharmā eva yuddhādayaḥ sa-doṣāḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1053: brahma-dharmāś ca tathety āha sahajam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1054: sahajaṃ svabhāva-prāptaṃ karma sadoṣam api hiṃsādi-miśram api na tyajed api tu vihitatvāt kuryād eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1055: nirdoṣatva-buddhyā brahma-karmaṇā cared ity arthaḥ yataḥ sarveti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1056: sarveṣāṃ brāhmaṇādi-varṇānām ārambhāḥ karmāṇi triguṇātmakatvād dravya-sādhyatvāc ca sāmānyataḥ kenacid doṣeṇāvṛtā vyāptā eva bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1057: dhūmenevāgnir iti yathāgner dhūmāṃśam apākṛtya śītādi-nivṛttaye tāpaḥ sevyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1058: tathā karmaṇāṃ bhagavad-arpaṇena doṣāṃśaṃ nirdhūyātma-darśanāya jñāna-janakatvāṃśaḥ sevya iti bhāvaḥ //48//
GE07bhg4c18u:1062: Śrīdhara: nanu karmaṇi kriyamāṇe kathaṃ doṣāṃśa-prahāṇena guṇāṃśa eva sampadyata ity apekṣāyām āha asakta-buddhir iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1065: vigata-spṛhaḥ vigatā spṛhā phala-viṣayecchā yasmāt saḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1066: evambhūtena saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ (Gītā 18.9) /
GE07bhg4c18u:1067: ity evaṃ pūrvoktena karmāsakti-tat-phalayos tyāga-lakṣaṇena sannyāsena naiṣkarmyasiddhiṃ sarva-karma-nivṛtti-lakṣaṇāṃ sattva-śuddhim adhigacchati
GE07bhg4c18u:1068: yadyapi saṅga-phalayos tyāgena karmānuṣṭhānam api naiṣkarmyam eva kartṛtvābhiniveśābhāvāt ( yad uktam - naiva kiñcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit (Gītā 5.8)
GE07bhg4c18u:1070: , tathāpy anenokta-lakṣaṇena sannyāsena paramāṃ naiṣkarmya-siddhiṃ sarva-karmāṇi manasā sannyasyāste
GE07bhg4c18u:1073: Viśvanātha: evaṃ sati karmaṇi doṣāṃsān kartṛtvābhiniveśa-phalābhisandhi-lakṣaṇān
GE07bhg4c18u:1074: tyaktavataḥ prathama-sannyāsinas tasya kālena sādhana-paripākato yogārūḍhatva-daśāyāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1075: karmaṇāṃ svarūpeṇāpi tyāga-rūpaṃ dvitīya-sannyāsam āha asakta-buddhiḥ sarvatrāpi
GE07bhg4c18u:1076: prākṛta-vastuṣu na saktā āsakti-śūnyā buddhir yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1077: ato jitātmā vaśīkṛta-citto vigatā brahma-loka-paryanteṣv api sukheṣu spṛhā yasya saḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1078: tataś ca sannyāsena karmaṇāṃ svarūpeṇāpi tyāgena naiṣkarmyasya paramāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ siddhim adhigacchati prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1079: yogārūḍha-daśāyāṃ tasya naiṣkarmyam atiśayena siddhir bhavatīty arthaḥ //49//
GE07bhg4c18u:1080: Baladeva: evam ārurukṣuḥ san-niṣṭho jñāna-garbhayā karma-niṣṭhayānubhūta-svarūpas tataḥ karma-niṣṭhāṃ svarūpatas tyajed ity āha asakteti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1081: sarvatrātmātirikteṣu vastuṣv asakta-buddhir yato jitātmā svātmānandāsvādena vaśīkṛta-manā ataeva vigata-spṛha ātmātirikta-vastu-sādhyeṣu nānā-vidheṣv ānandeṣu spṛhā-śūnyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1082: svātmānandāsvāda-vikṣepakānāṃ karmaṇāṃ sannyāsena svarūpatas tyāgena paramāṃ naiṣkarmya-lakṣaṇāṃ siddhim adhigacchati yogārūḍhaḥ san /
GE07bhg4c18u:1083: evam evoktaṃ tṛtīye yas tv ātma-ratir eva syād (Gītā 3.17) ity ādinā //49//
GE07bhg4c18u:1085: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me /
GE07bhg4c18u:1086: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā //50//
GE07bhg4c18u:1087: Śrīdhara: evambhūtasya paramahaṃsasya jñāna-niṣṭhāyā brahma-bhāva-prakāram āha siddhiṃ prāpta iti ṣaḍbhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1088: naiṣkarmya-siddhiṃ prāptaḥ san yathā yena prakāreṇa brahma prāpnoti tathā taṃ prakāraṃ saṅkṣepeṇaiva me vacanān nibodha /
GE07bhg4c18u:1089: pratiṣṭhitā yā brahma-prāptiḥ tām imāṃ tathā darśayitum āha niṣṭhā jñānasya yā pareti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1091: Viśvanātha: tataś ca yathā yena prakāreṇa brahma prāpnoti brahmānubhavatīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1092: saiva jñānasya niṣṭhā parā paramo 'nta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1094: avidyāyām uparata-prāyāyāṃ vidyāyā apy uparamārambhe yena prakāreṇa jñāna-sannyāsaṃ kṛtvā brahmānubhavet taṃ budhyasvety arthaḥ //50//
GE07bhg4c18u:1096: vihitena karmaṇā harim ārādhya tat-prasāda-jāṃ sarva-karma-tyāgāntāṃ ātma-dhyāna-niṣṭhāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1097: prāpto yathā yena prakāreṇa sthito brahma prāpnoti āvirbhāvita-guṇāṣṭakaṃ svarūpam anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1098: tathā taṃ prakāraṃ samāsena gadato me matto nibodha /
GE07bhg4c18u:1099: jñānasya yā parā niṣṭhā pareśa-viṣayā jñāna-niṣṭhā tvāṃ prati mayocyate tāṃ ca śṛṇu //50//
GE07bhg4c18u:1101: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:1102: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca //51//
GE07bhg4c18u:1105: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham /
GE07bhg4c18u:1108: uktena prakāreṇa viśuddhayā pūrvoktayā sāttvikyā buddhyā yukto dhṛtyā sāttvikyā ātmānaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1109: tām eva buddhiṃ niyamya niścalāṃ kṛtvā śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā tad-viṣayau rāga-dveṣau
GE07bhg4c18u:1110: vyudasya buddhyā viśuddhayā yukta ity ādīnāṃ brahma-bhūyāya kalpata iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ // 51//
GE07bhg4c18u:1112: vivikta-sevī śuci-deśāvasthāyī laghvāśī mita-bhojī etair upāyair yata-vāk-kāya-mānasaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1113: saṃyata-vāg-deha-citto bhūtvā nityaṃ sarvadā dhyānena yo yogo brahma-saṃsparśas tat-paraḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1114: san dhyānāvicchedārthaṃ punaḥ punar dṛḍhaṃ vairāgyaṃ samyag upāśrito bhūtvā // 52//
GE07bhg4c18u:1116: virakto 'ham ity ādy ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ durāgrahaṃ darpaṃ yoga-balād unmārga-pravṛtti-lakṣaṇaṃ prārabdha-vaśāt prāpyamāneṣv api
GE07bhg4c18u:1117: viṣayeṣu kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigrahaṃ ca vimucya viśeṣeṇa tyaktvā balād āpanneṣu nirma
GE07bhg4c18u:1118: maḥ san śāntaḥ paramām upaśāntiṃ prāpto brahma-bhūyāya brahmāham iti naiścalyenāvasthānāya kalpate yogyaś ca bhavati //53//
GE07bhg4c18u:1119: Viśvanātha: buddhyā viśuddhayā sāttvikyā dhṛtyāpi sāttvikyātmānaṃ mano niyamya /
GE07bhg4c18u:1120: dhyānena bhagavac-cintanenaiva yaḥ paro yogas tat-parāyaṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1123: śāntaḥ sattva-guṇasyāpy upaśāntimān iti kṛta-jñāna-sannyāsa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1126: ajñāna-jñānayor uparamaṃ vinā brahmānubhavānupattir iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1129: viśuddhayā sāttvikyā buddhyā yuktas tādṛśyā dhṛtyā cātmānaṃ mano niyamya samādhi-yogyaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1130: kṛtvā śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā tān sannihitān vidhāya rāga-dveṣau ca tad-dhetukau
GE07bhg4c18u:1132: vivikta-sevī nirjana-sthaḥ laghvāśī mita-bhuk yatāni dhyeyābhimukhīkṛtāni vāgādīni yena saḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1138: darpas tad-dhetukaḥ prārabdha-śeṣa-vaśād upāgateṣu bhogyeṣu kāmo 'bhilāṣaḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:1141: tan etān ahaṅkārādīn vimucya nirmamaḥ san brahma-bhūyāya guṇāṣṭaka-viśiṣṭa-svātma-rūpatvāya
GE07bhg4c18u:1145: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1146: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām //54//
GE07bhg4c18u:1147: Śrīdhara: brahmāham iti naiścalyenāvasthānasya phalam āha brahmeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1148: brahma-bhūto brahmaṇy avasthitaḥ prasanna-cittaḥ naṣṭaṃ na śocati na cāprāptaṃ kāṅkṣati dehādya-abhimānābhāvāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1149: ataeva sarveṣv api bhūteṣu samaḥ san rāga-dveṣam ādikṛta-vikṣepābhāvāt sarva-bhūteṣu mad-bhāvanā-lakṣaṇṃṃ parāṃ bhaktiṃ labhate //54//
GE07bhg4c18u:1150: Viśvanātha: tataś copādhy-apagame sati brahma-bhūto 'nāvṛtta-caitanyatvena brahma-rūpa ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1153: tataś ca pūrva-daśāyām iva naṣṭaṃ na śocati na cāprāptaṃ kāṅkṣati dehādy-abhimānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1154: sarveṣu bhūteṣu bhadrābhadreṣu bālaka iva samaḥ bāhyānusandhānābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1155: tataś ca nirindhanāgnāv iva jñāne śānte 'py anaśvarāṃ jñānāntarbhūtāṃ mad-bhaktiṃ śravaṇa-kīrtanādi-rūpāṃ labhate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1156: tasyā mat-svarūpa-śakti-vṛttitvena māyā-śakti-bhinnatvād avidyāvidyayor apagame 'py anapagamāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1157: ataeva parāṃ jñānād anyāṃ śreṣṭhāṃ niṣkāma-karma-jñānādy-urvaritatvena kevalām ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1158: labhata iti pūrvaṃ jñāna-vairāgyādiṣu mokṣa-siddhy-arthaṃ kalayā vartamānāyā api sarva-bhūteṣv antaryāmina iva tasyāḥ spaṣṭopalabdhir nāsīd iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1159: ataeva kuruta ity anuktvā labhata iti prayuktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1160: māṣam udgādiṣu militāṃ teṣu naṣṭeṣv apy anaśvarāṃ kāñcana-maṇikām iva tebhyaḥ pṛthaktayā kevalāṃ labhata itivat /
GE07bhg4c18u:1161: sampūrṇāyāḥ prema-bhaktes tu prāyas tadānīṃ lābha-sambhavo 'sti nāpi tasyāḥ phalaṃ sāyujyam ity ataḥ parā-śabdena
GE07bhg4c18u:1163: Baladeva: tasya brahma-bhūyottara-bhāvinaṃ lābham āha brahmeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1165: prasannātmā kleśa-karma-vipākāśayānāṃ vigamād atisvacchaḥ - nadyaḥ prasanna-salilāḥ ity ādāv ativaimalyaṃ prasnna-śabdārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1166: sa evambhūto mad-anyāt kāṃścit prati na śocati na ca tān kāṅkṣati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1167: sarveṣu mad-anyeṣūccāvaceṣu bhūteṣu samaḥ heyatvāviśeṣālloṣṭra-kāṣṭhavattvāni manyamānaḥ īdṛśaḥ san parāṃ mad-bhaktiṃ niṣṭhāṃ jñānasya yā parā ity (Gītā 18.50)
GE07bhg4c18u:1168: uktāṃ mad-anubhava-lakṣaṇāṃ mad-vīkṣaṇa-samānākārāṃ sādhyāṃ bhaktiṃ vindatīty arthaḥ //54//
GE07bhg4c18u:1170: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1171: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram //55//
GE07bhg4c18u:1173: tathā ca parayā bhaktyā tattvato mām abhijānāti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1175: yāvān sarva-vyāpī yaś cāsmi sac-cid-ānanda-ghanas tathābhutaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1176: tataś ca mām evaṃ tattvato jñātvā tad-anantaraṃ tasya jñānasya uparame sati māṃ viśate paramānanda-rūpo bhavatīty arthaḥ //55//
GE07bhg4c18u:1177: Viśvanātha: nanu tayā labdhayā bhaktyā tadānīṃ tasya kiṃ syād ity ato 'rthāntra-nyāsenāha bhaktyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1178: ahaṃ yāvān yaś cāsmi taṃ māṃ tat-padārthaṃ jñānī vā nānāvidho bhakto vā bhaktyaiva tattvato 'bhijānāti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1180: yasmād evaṃ tasmāt prastutaḥ sa jñānī tatas tayā bhaktyaiva tad-anantaraṃ vidyoparamād uttara-kāla eva māṃ jñātvā māṃ viśati mat-sāyujya-sukham anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1181: mama māyātītatvād avidyāyāś ca māyātvād vidyayāpy aham avagamya[*ENDNOTE] iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1182: yat tu sāṅkhya-yogau ca vairāgyaṃ tapo bhaktiś ca keśave /
GE07bhg4c18u:1183: pañca-parvaiva vidyā iti nārada-pañcarātre vidyā-vṛttitvena bhaktiḥ śrūyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1184: tat khalu hlādinī-śakti-vṛtter bhakter eva kalā kācid vidyā-sāphalyārthaṃ vidyāyāṃ praviṣṭā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1187: yato nirguṇā bhaktiḥ sad-guṇamayyā vidyāyā vṛttir vastuto na bhavati,
GE07bhg4c18u:1188: ato hy ajñāna-nivartakatvenaiva vidyāyāḥ kāraṇatvaṃ tat-padārtha-jñāne tu bhakter eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1189: kiṃ ca - sattvāt sañjāyate jñānam iti smṛteḥ (Gītā 14.17)
GE07bhg4c18u:1191: tac ca sattvaṃ vidyā-śabdenocyate yathā tathā bhakty-utthaṃ jñānaṃ bhaktir eva saiva kvacit bhakti-śabdena kvacit jñāna-śabdena cocyata iti jñānam api dvividhaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1192: tatra prathamaṃ jñānaṃ saṃnyasya dvitīyena jñānena brahma-sāyujyam āpnuyād ity ekādaśa-skandha-pañcaviṃśaty-adhyāya-dṛṣṭyāpi[*ENDNOTE] jñeyam
GE07bhg4c18u:1193: atra kecid bhaktyā vinaiva kevalenaiva jñānena sāyujyārthinas te jñāni-māninaḥ kleśa-mātra-phalā ativigītā eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1194: anye tu bhaktyā vinā kevalena jñānena na muktir iti jñātvā bhakti-miśram eva jñānam
GE07bhg4c18u:1195: abhasyanto bhagavāṃs tu māyopādhir eveti bhagavad-vapur guṇa-mayaṃ manyamānā yogārūḍhatva-daśām
GE07bhg4c18u:1196: api prāptās te 'pi jñānino vimukta-mānino vigītā eva / yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c18u:1205: asyārthaḥ ye na bhajanti ye ca bhajanto 'py avajānanti te sannyāsino 'pi vinaṣṭa-vidyā apy adhaḥ patanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1212: anādṛta-yuṣmad-aṅghraya iti tanor guṇa-mayatva-buddhir eva tanor anādaraḥ / yad uktaṃ -
GE07bhg4c18u:1215: vastutas tu mānuṣī sā tanuḥ saccidānandam apy eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1221: kaḥ paśyet tam imaṃ prabhum // iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1222: evaṃ ca bhagavat-tanoḥ saccidānandamayatve k ptaṃ sac-cid-ānanda-vigraham śrī-vṛndāvana-sura-bhūruha-talāsīnam iti (GTU 1.33) /
GE07bhg4c18u:1223: śābdaṃ brahma vapur dadhat ity ādi śrutiḥ-smṛti-para-sahasra-vacaneṣu pramāṇeṣu satsv api - māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram iti (ŚvetU 4.2)
GE07bhg4c18u:1224: iti śruti-dṛṣṭyaiva bhagavān api māyopādhir iti manyante kintu svarūpa-bhūtayā nitya-śaktyā māyākhyayā yutaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1225: ato māya-mayaṃ viṣṇuṃ pravadanti sanātanam iti mādhva-bhāṣya-pramāṇita-śruteḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1226: māyāṃ tv ity atra māyā-śabdena svarūpa-bhūtā cic-chaktir evābhidhīyate na tv asvarūpa-bhūtā triguṇa-mayy eva śaktir iti tasyāḥ śruter arthaṃ na manyante /
GE07bhg4c18u:1227: yad vā prakṛtiṃ durgāṃ māyinaṃ tu maheśvaraṃ śambhuṃ vidyād ity artham api naiva manyante /
GE07bhg4c18u:1228: ato bhagavad-aparādhena jīvan-muktva-daśāṃ prāptā api te 'dhaḥ patanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1234: te ca phala-prāptau satyām arthāt nāsti sādhanopayoga iti matvā jñāna-sannyāsa-kāle jñānaṃ tatra guṇī-bhūtāṃ bhaktim api santyajya,
GE07bhg4c18u:1236: śrī-vigrahāparādhena bhaktyā api jñānena sārdham antardhānād bhaktiṃ te punar naiva labhante /
GE07bhg4c18u:1237: bhaktyā vinā ca tat-padārthānanubhāvān mṛṣā-samādhayo jīvan-mukta-mānina eva te jñeyāḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1239: ye tu bhakti-miśraṃ jñānam abhyasyanto bhagavan-mūrtiṃ sac-cid-ānandamayīm eva mānayānāḥ krameṇāvidyāvidyayor uparāme parāṃ bhaktiṃ labhante
GE07bhg4c18u:1241: eke sāyujyārthaṃ bhaktiṃ kurvantas tayaiva tat padārtham aparokṣīkṛtya tasmin sāyujyaṃ labhante te saṅgītā eva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1242: apare bhūribhāgā yādṛcchika-śānta-mahā-bhāgavata-saṅga-prabhāvena tyakta-mumukṣāḥ śukādivad bhakti-rasa-mādhuryāsvāda eva nimajjanti,
GE07bhg4c18u:1243: te tu parama-saṅgītā eva / yad uktam -
GE07bhg4c18u:1248: tad evaṃ caturvidhā jñānino dvaye vigītāḥ patanti,
GE07bhg4c18u:1250: Baladeva: tataḥ kiṃ tad āha bhaktyeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1251: svarūpato guṇataś ca yo 'haṃ vibhūtitaś ca yāvān aham asmi taṃ mām parayā mad-bhaktyā tat tv abhijānāty anubhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1252: tato mat-parama-bhaktito hetor ukta-lakṣaṇaṃ māṃ tattvato yāthātmyena jñātvānubhūya tad-anantaraṃ tata eva hetor māṃ viśate mayā saha yujyate
GE07bhg4c18u:1253: puraṃ praviśati ity atra pura-saṃyoga eva pratīyate na tu purātmakatvam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1254: atra tattvato 'bhijñāne praveśe ca bhaktir eva hetur ukto bodhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1257: tad-anantaram iti mat-svarūpa-guṇa-vibhūti-tāttvikānubhavād uttarasmin kāle ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1258: yad vā, parayā bhaktyā māṃ tattvato jñātvā tatas tāṃ bhaktim ādāyaiva māṃ viśate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1260: mokṣe 'pi bhaktir astīty āha sūtra-kṛt āprāyaṇāt tatrāpi hi dṛṣṭam iti (Vs 4.1.12)
GE07bhg4c18u:1261: āprāyaṇād āmokṣāt tatrāpi ca mokse bhaktir anuvartate iti śrutau dṛṣṭam iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1262: bhaktyā vinaṣṭāvidyānāṃ bhaktyāḥ svādo vivardhate sitayā naṣṭa-pittānāṃ sitāsvādavad iti rahasya-vidaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1267: Śrīdhara: sva-karmabhiḥ parameśvarārādhanād uktaṃ mokṣa-prakāram upasaṃharati sarva-karmāṇīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1268: sarvāṇi nityāni naimittikāni ca karmāṇi purvokta-krameṇa sarvadā kurvāṇaḥ mad-vyapāśrayaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1269: aham eva vyāpāśrayaḥ āśrayaṇīyo na tu svargādi-phalaṃ yasya sa mat-prasādād śāśvatam
GE07bhg4c18u:1271: Viśvanātha: tad evaṃ jñānī yathā-krameṇaiva karma-phala-sannyāsa-karma-sannyāsair mat-sāyujyaṃ prāpnotīty uktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1272: mad-bhaktas tu māṃ yathā prāpnoti tad api śṛṇv ity āha sarveti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1273: mad-vyapāśrayo māṃ viśeṣato 'pakarṣeṇa sakāmatayāpi ya āśrayate so 'pi kiṃ punar niṣkāma-bhakta ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1277: atrāśrayate samyag sevata iti āḍ-upasargena sevāyāḥ pradhānībhūtatvam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1280: na tu bhakti-miśra-karmavān iti prathama-ṣaṭkokte karmaṇi nātivyāptiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1282: nanu mahā-pralaye tat tad dhāma kathaṃ sthāsyati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1283: tatrāha - avyayaṃ mahā-pralaye mad-dhāmnaḥ kim api na vyayati mad-atarkya-prabhāvād iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1284: nanu jñānī khalv anekair janmabhir aneka-tapa-ādi-kleśaiḥ sarva-viṣayendriyoparāmeṇaiva naiṣkarmye saty eva yat sāyujyaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1285: tasya te nityaṃ dhāma sakarmakatve sakāmakatve 'pi tvad-āśrayaṇa-mātreṇaiva kathaṃ prāpnoti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1286: tatrāha mat-prasādād iti mat-prasādasyātarkyam eva prabhāvatvaṃ jānīhīti bhāvaḥ //56//
GE07bhg4c18u:1287: Baladeva: atha pariniṣṭhitānām āha sarveti sārdha-dvayābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:1288: mad-vyapāśrayo mad-ekāntī sarvāṇi sva-vihitāni karmāṇi yathā-yogaṃ kurvāṇaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1290: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ - sarvathāpi tatra vobhaya-liṅgāt (Vs 3.4.34) iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1291: īdṛśaḥ sa mat-prasādān mad-atyanugrahāt śāśvataṃ nityam avyayam apariṇāmi-jñānānandātmakaṃ padaṃ param-vyomākhyam avāpnoti labhate //56//
GE07bhg4c18u:1297: cetasā mayi saṃnyasya samarpya mat-paraḥ aham eva paraḥ prāpyaḥ puruṣārtho yasya
GE07bhg4c18u:1298: sa vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā yogam upāśritya satataṃ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'pi brahmārpaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1300: nyāyena mayy eva cittaṃ yasya tathābhūto bhava //57//
GE07bhg4c18u:1301: Viśvanātha: nanu tarhi māṃ prati tvaṃ niścayena kim ājñāpayasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1306: kintu tvaṃ madhyama-bhakto bhavety āha cetaseti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1307: sarva-karmāṇi svāśrama-dharmān vyavahārika-karmāṇi ca mayi sannyasya samarpya,
GE07bhg4c18u:1308: mat-paro 'ham eva paraḥ prāpyaḥ puruṣārtho yasya sa niṣkāma ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1314: buddhi-yogaṃ vyavasāyātmikayā buddhyā yogaṃ satataṃ mac-cittaḥ karmānuṣṭhāna-kāle 'nyadāpi māṃ smaran bhava //57//
GE07bhg4c18u:1315: Baladeva: tādṛśatvād eva tvaṃ sarvāṇi sva-vihitāni karmāṇi kartṛtvābhimānādi-śūnyenacetasā
GE07bhg4c18u:1316: svāmini mayi sannyasyārpayitvā mat-paro mad-eka-puruṣārtho mām eva buddhi-yogam upāśritya
GE07bhg4c18u:1318: etac ca tvāṃ prati prāg apy uktaṃ yat karoṣīty ādinā arpayitvaiva karmāṇi kuru,
GE07bhg4c18u:1322: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi //58//
GE07bhg4c18u:1323: Śrīdhara: tato yad bhaviṣyati tac chṛṇu - mac-citta iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1324: mac-cittaḥ san mat-prasādāt sarvāṇy api durgāṇi dustarāṇi sāṃsārika-duḥkhāni tariṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1325: vipakṣe doṣam āha -- atha cet yadi punas tvam ahaṃkārān jñātṛtvābhimānāt mad uktam evaṃ na śroṣyasi tarhi vinaṅkṣyasi puruṣārthād bhraṣṭo bhaviṣyasi
GE07bhg4c18u:1326: Viśvanātha : tataḥ kim ata āha mac-citta iti //58//
GE07bhg4c18u:1327: Baladeva : evaṃ mac-cittas tvaṃ mat-prasādād eva sarvāṇi durgāṇi dustarāṇi saṃsāra-duḥkhāni tariṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1329: tāny ahaṃ bhakta-bandhur apaneṣyami dāsyāmi cātmānam iti pariniṣṭhitānāṃ sādhana-sādhya-paddhatir uktā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1330: atha ced ahaṅkārāt kṛtyākṛtya-viṣayaka-jñānābhimānāt tvaṃ mad-uktaṃ na śroṣyasi tarhi vinaṅkṣyasi svārthāt vibhraṣṭo bhaviṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1331: na hi kaścit prāṇināṃ kṛtyākṛtyor vijñātā praśāstā vā matto 'nyo vartate //58//
GE07bhg4c18u:1333: yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase /
GE07bhg4c18u:1334: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati //59//
GE07bhg4c18u:1335: Śrīdhara: kāmaṃ vinaṅkṣyasi na tu bandhubhir yuddhaṃ kariṣyāmīti cet tatrāha
GE07bhg4c18u:1337: mad-uktam anādṛtya kevalam ahaṅkāram avalambya yuddhaṃ na kariṣyāmīti yan manyase tvam adhyavasyasi eṣa tava vyavasāyo mithyaiva asvatantratvāt tava /
GE07bhg4c18u:1338: tad evāha prakṛtis tvāṃ rajo-guṇa-rūpeṇa pariṇatā satī niyokṣyati pravartayiṣyatīti //59//
GE07bhg4c18u:1339: Viśvanātha: nanu kṣatriyasya mama[*ENDNOTE] yuddham eva paro dharmas tatra bandhu-vadha-pāpād bhīta eva pravartituṃ necchāmīti tatra sa-tarjanam āha yad aham iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1342: yadā tu mahāvīrasya tava svābhāviko yuddhotsāho durvāra evodbhaviṣyati tadā yudhyamānaḥ svayam eva bhīṣmādīn gurūn haniṣyan mayā hasiṣyasa iti bhāvaḥ //59//
GE07bhg4c18u:1343: Baladeva: yadyapi kṣatriyasya yuddham eva dharmas tathāpi guru-viprādi-vadha-hetukāt
GE07bhg4c18u:1344: pāpād bhītasya me na tatra pravṛttir iti kṛtyākṛtya-vijñātṛtvābhimānam ahaṅkāram
GE07bhg4c18u:1345: āśritya nāhaṃ yotsye iti yadi tvaṃ manyase,
GE07bhg4c18u:1346: tarhi tavaiṣa vyavasāyo niścayo mithyā niṣphalo bhāvī,
GE07bhg4c18u:1347: prakṛtir man-māyā rajo-guṇātmanā pariṇatā mad-vākyāvahelinaṃ tvāṃ gurv-ādi-vadhe nimitte yuddhe niyokṣyati pravartayiṣyaty eva //59//
GE07bhg4c18u:1350: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśopi tat //60//
GE07bhg4c18u:1352: svabhāvaḥ kṣatriyatva-hetuḥ pūrva-janma-saṃskāras tasmāj jātena svīyena karmaṇā śauryādinā
GE07bhg4c18u:1353: pūrvoktena nibaddhaḥ yantritas tvaṃ mohāt yat karma yuddha-lakṣaṇaṃ kartuṃ necchasi
GE07bhg4c18u:1354: avaśaḥ san tat karma kariṣyasy eva //60 //
GE07bhg4c18u:1355: Viśvanātha: uktam evārthaṃ vivṛṇoti svabhāvaḥ kṣatriyatve hetuḥ pūrva-saṃskāras tasmāj jātena svīyena karmaṇā nibaddho yantritaḥ //60//
GE07bhg4c18u:1357: yadi tvaṃ mohād ajñānān mad-uktam api yuddhaṃ kartuṃ necchasi,
GE07bhg4c18u:1358: tadā svabhāvajena svena karmaṇā śauryeṇa man-māyodbhāsitena nibaddho 'vaśas tat kariṣyasi //60//
GE07bhg4c18u:1363: Śrīdhara: tad evaṃ śloka-dvayena sāṅkhyādi-mate prakṛti-pāratantryaṃ svabhāva-pāratantryaṃ coktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1364: idānīṃ svamatam āha īśvara iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:1366: kiṃ kurvan, sarvāṇi bhūtāni māyayā nija-śaktyā bhrāmayaṃs tat-tat-karmasu pravartayan,
GE07bhg4c18u:1367: yathā dāru-yantram ārūḍhāni kṛtrimāni bhūtāni sūtradhāro loke bhrāmayati tadvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1368: yad vā yantrāṇi śarīrāṇi ārūḍhāni bhūtāni dehābhimānino jīvān bhramayann ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1373: sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaś ca // iti // (ŚvetU 6.11)
GE07bhg4c18u:1374: antaryāmi-brāhmaṇaṃ[*ENDNOTE] ca -- ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmānam antaro yamayati yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram eva te ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ // ity ādi //61//
GE07bhg4c18u:1375: Viśvanātha: śloka-dvayena svabhāva-vādināṃ matam uktvā sva-matam āha īśvaro nārāyaṇaḥ sarvāntaryāmī /
GE07bhg4c18u:1385: ity ādi śruti-pratipādita īśvaro 'ntaryāmī hṛdi tiṣṭhati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1387: bhūtāni māyayā nija-śaktyā bhrāmayan bhramayan[*ENDNOTE] tat-tat-karmāṇi pravartayan,
GE07bhg4c18u:1388: yathā sūtra-sañcārādi-yantram ārūḍhāni kṛtrimāṇi pāñcālikā-rūpāṇi sarva-bhūtāni māyā vibhramayati tadvad ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1389: yad vā yantrārūḍhāni śarīrārūḍhān sarva-jīvān ity arthaḥ //61//
GE07bhg4c18u:1390: Baladeva: vijñātṛtvābhimānam ivālakṣyārjunam atyājyatvād vidhānterṇopadiśati īśvara iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:1391: he arjuna tvaṃ cet svaṃ vijṇaṃ manyase,
GE07bhg4c18u:1392: tarhy antaryāmi-brāhmaṇāt tvayā jñāto ya īśvaraḥ sarva-bhūtānāṃ brahmādi-sthāvarāntānāṃ hṛddeśe tiṣṭhati māyayā sva-śaktyā tāni bhrāmayan san
GE07bhg4c18u:1394: yat karmānuguṇaṃ māyā-nirmitaṃ dehendriya-prāṇa-lakṣaṇaṃ yantraṃ tad-ārūḍhāni /
GE07bhg4c18u:1395: rūpakeṇopamātra vyajyate - yathā sūtra-dhāro dāru-yantrārūḍhāni kṛtrimāṇi bhūtāni bhrāmayati tadvat //61//
GE07bhg4c18u:1397: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata /
GE07bhg4c18u:1398: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam //62//
GE07bhg4c18u:1400: yasmād evaṃ sarve jīvāḥ parameśvara-paratantrāḥ tasmād ahaṅkāraṃ parityajya sarva-bhāvena sarvātmanā tam īśvaram eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha /
GE07bhg4c18u:1401: tataś ca tasyaiva prasādāt parāṃ uttamāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ ca pārameśvaraṃ śāśvataṃ nityaṃ prāpsyasi //62//
GE07bhg4c18u:1408: anyas tu yo mad-iṣṭa-devaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ sa eva mad-gurur māṃ bhakti-yogam anukūlaṃ hitaṃ copadeśam upadiśati ca /
GE07bhg4c18u:1409: tam ahaṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadye ity aniśaṃ bhāvayeti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1415: Baladeva: tarhi tam eveśvaraṃ sarva-bhāvena kāyādi-vyāpāreṇa śaraṇaṃ gaccha /
GE07bhg4c18u:1416: tataḥ kim iti cet tatrāha tad iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1419: tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam ity ādi śruti-gītaṃ tad dhāma prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1420: sa ceśvaro 'ham eva tvat-sakhaḥ sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ ity (Gītā 15.15)
GE07bhg4c18u:1421: ādi mat-pūrvokter deva-rṣy-ādi-sammati-grāhiṇā tvayāpi paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma (Gītā 10.12)
GE07bhg4c18u:1426: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1429: ity anena prakāreṇa te tubhyaṃ sarvajñena parama-kāruṇikena mayā jñānam ākhyātam upadiṣṭam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1432: etan mayopadiṣṭaṃ gītā-śāstram aśeṣato paryālocya paścād yathecchasi tathā kuru /
GE07bhg4c18u:1433: etasmin paryālocite sati tava moho nivartiṣyata iti bhāvaḥ //63//
GE07bhg4c18u:1435: karma-yogasyāṣṭāṅga-yogasya jñāna-yogasya ca jñānaṃ jñāyate 'neneti jñānaṃ jñāna-śāstraṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1436: guhyād guhyataram ity atirahasyatvāt kair api vaśiṣṭa-bādarāyaṇa-nāradādyair api
GE07bhg4c18u:1438: yad vā, teṣāṃ sārvajñyam āpekṣikaṃ mama tu ātyantikam ity atas te tu etad atiguhyatvān na jānanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1439: mayāpi atiguhyatvād eva te sarvathaiva naitad upadiṣṭā iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1442: yat[*ENDNOTE] kartum icchasi tathā tat kuru,
GE07bhg4c18u:1444: ṣaṭka-trikam idaṃ sarva-vidyā-śiro-ratnaṃ śrī-gītā-śāstraṃ mahānarghya-rahasyatama-bhakti-sampuṭaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1446: bhavati / antyaṃ jñāna-ṣaṭkaṃ yasyottara-pidhānaṃ maṇi-jaṭitaṃ kānakaṃ bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1447: tayor madhyavarti-ṣaṭka-gatā bhaktis trijagad-anarghyā śrī-kṛṣṇa-vaśīkāriṇī mahāmaṇi-matallikā virājate,
GE07bhg4c18u:1448: yasyāḥ paricārikā tad-uttara-pidhānārdha-gatā man-manā bhava ity ādi padya-dvayī catuḥ-ṣaṣṭhy-akṣarā śuddhā bhavatīti budhyate //63//
GE07bhg4c18u:1450: iti pūrvokta-prakārakaṃ jñānaṃ gītā-śāstram jñāyante karma-bhakti-jñānāny anena iti nirukteḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1453: etac chāstra-śeṣeṇa sāmastyena vimṛśya paścād yathecchasi tathā kuru /
GE07bhg4c18u:1454: etasmin paryālocite tava moha-vināśo mad-vacasi sthitiś ca bhaviṣyatīti //63//
GE07bhg4c18u:1456: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1457: iṣṭosi me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam //64//
GE07bhg4c18u:1458: Śrīdhara: ati-gambhīraṃ gītā-śāstram aśeṣataḥ paryālocayitum aśaknuvataḥ kṛpayā svayam eva tasya sāraṃ saṅgṛhya kathayati sarva-guhyatamam iti tribhiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1459: sarvebhyo 'pu guhyebhyo guhyatamaṃ me vacas tatra tatroktam api bhūyaḥ punar api vakṣyamaṇaṃ śṛṇu /
GE07bhg4c18u:1460: punaḥ punaḥ kathane hetum āha dṛḍham atyantaṃ me mama tvam iṣṭaḥ priyo 'sīti matvā tata eva hetos te hitaṃ vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1461: yad vā tvaṃ mameṣṭo 'si mayā vakṣyamāṇaṃ ca dṛḍhaṃ sarva-pramāṇopetam iti niścitya tatas te vakṣyāmīty arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1463: Viśvanātha: tataś ca atigambhīrārthaṃ gītā-śāstraṃ paryālocayitum pravartamānaṃ tuṣṇīmbhūyaiva
GE07bhg4c18u:1464: sthitaṃ sva-priya-sakham arjunam ālakṣya kṛpā-dravac-citta-nava-nīto bhagavān bhoḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1465: priyavayasya arjuna sarva-śāstra-sāram aham eva ślokāṣṭakena bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1472: yat tad eva paramaṃ sarva-śāstrārtha-sārasya gītā-śāstrasyāpi sāraṃ guhyatamam iti nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcana guhyam asti kvacit kutaścit katham api akhaṇḍam iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1474: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham atiśayena eva priyo me sakhā bhavasīti tata eva hetor hitaṃ te iti sakhāyaṃ vinātirahasyaṃ na kam api kaścid api brūta iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1476: Baladeva: atha nirapekṣāṇāṃ sādhana-sādhya-paddhatim upadeksyann ādau tāṃ stauti sarveti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1477: sarveṣu guhyeṣu madhye 'tiśayitaṃ guhyam iti sarva-guhyatamam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1478: bhūya iti rāja-vidyādhyāye man-manā bhava ity ādinā pūrvam api mamātipriyatvād ante punar ucyamānaṃ śṛṇu paramaṃ sarva-sārasyāpi gītā-śāstrasya sārabhūtam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1481: mad-vākyaṃ dṛḍhaṃ nikhila-pramāṇopetam iti niścinoṣy atas te hitaṃ vakṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1484: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru /
GE07bhg4c18u:1485: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyosi me //65//
GE07bhg4c18u:1486: Śrīdhara: tad evam āha man-manā iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1490: mām eva namaskuru evaṃ vartamānas tvaṃ mat-prasādāt labdha-jñānena mām evaiṣyasi prāpsyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1493: atha satyaṃ yathā bhavaty evaṃ tubhyam ahaṃ pratijāne pratijñāṃ karomi //65//
GE07bhg4c18u:1494: Viśvanātha: manmanā bhava iti mad-bhaktaḥ sann eva māṃ cintaya /
GE07bhg4c18u:1495: na tu jñānī yogī vā bhūtvā mad-dhyānaṃ kurv ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1496: yad vā man-manā bhava mahyaṃ śyāmasundarāya susnigdhākuñcita-kuntalakāya-sundara-bhrū-valli-madhura-kṛpā-kaṭākṣāmṛta-varṣi-vadana-candrāya
GE07bhg4c18u:1497: svīyaṃ deyatvena mano yasya tathābhūto bhava /
GE07bhg4c18u:1498: athavā śrotrādīndriyāṇi dehīty āha mad-bhakto bhava /
GE07bhg4c18u:1500: athavā mahyaṃ gandha-puṣpa-dhūpa-dīpa-naivedyāni dehīty āha mad-yājī bhava /
GE07bhg4c18u:1502: athavā mahyaṃ namaskāra-mātraṃ dehīty āha māṃ namaskuru bhūmau nipatya aṣṭāṅgaṃ vā praṇāmaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c18u:1504: mac-cintana-sevana-pūjana-praṇāmāṇāṃ samuccayam ekataraṃ vā tvaṃ kuru /
