GE07bhg4c18u:1505: mām evaiṣyasi prāpsyasi manaḥ-pradānaṃ śrotrādīndriya-pradānaṃ gandha-puṣpādi-pradānaṃ vā tvaṃ kuru /
GE07bhg4c18u:1506: tubhyam aham ātmānam eva dāsyāmīti satyaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1510: nanu māthura-deśodbhūtā lokāḥ prativākyam eva śapathaṃ kurvanti satyaṃ tarhi pratijāne pratijñāṃ kṛtvā bravīmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1511: tvaṃ me priyo 'si nahi priyaṃ ko 'pi vañcayait iti bhāvaḥ //65//
GE07bhg4c18u:1513: vyākhyātaṃ prāk man-manastvād viśiṣṭo mām eva nīlotpala-śyāmalatvādi-guṇakaṃ tvad-atipriyam devakī-nandanaṃ kṛṣṇam eva manuṣya-sanniveśitam eṣyasi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1514: na tu mama rūpāntaraṃ sahasra-śīrṣatvādi-lakṣaṇam aṅguṣṭha-mātram antaryāmiṇaṃ vā nṛsiṃha-varāhādi-lakṣaṇaṃ vety arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1515: tubhyam aham ātmānam eva tvat-sakhaṃ dāsyāmīti te tava satyaṃ śapathaḥ satyaṃ śapatha-tathyayoḥ iti nānārthavargaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1517: nanu māthuratvāt tava śapatha-karaṇād api me na saṃśaya-vināśas tatrāha pratijāne pratijñāṃ kṛtvāham abruvam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1518: yat tvaṃ me priyo 'si snigdha-manasā hi māthurāḥ priyaṃ na pratārayanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1520: yasya mayy atiprītas tasmin mamāpi tathā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1521: tad-viyogaṃ soḍhum ahaṃ na śaknomīti pūrvam eva mayoktaṃ priyo hi ityādinā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1522: tasmān mad-vāci viśvasihi mām eva prāpsyasi //65//
GE07bhg4c18u:1524: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GE07bhg4c18u:1525: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣyayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ //66//
GE07bhg4c18u:1527: mad-bhaktyaiva sarvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti dṛḍha-viśvāsena vidhi-kaiṅkaryaṃ tyaktvā mad-eka-śaraṇaṃ bhava /
GE07bhg4c18u:1528: evaṃ vartamānaḥ karma-tyāga-nimittaṃ pāpaṃ syād iti mā śucaḥ mokṣaṃ mā kārṣīḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1530: Viśvanātha: nanu tad-dhyānādikaṃ yat karomi tat kiṃ svāśrama-dharmānuṣṭhāna-pūrvakaṃ vā, kevalaṃ vā ?
GE07bhg4c18u:1531: tatrāha sarva-dharmān varṇāśrama-dharmān sarvān eva parityajya ekaṃ mām eva śaraṇaṃ vraja /
GE07bhg4c18u:1532: parityajya sannyasyeti na vyākhyeyam arjunasya kṣatriyatvena sannyāsādhikārāt na cārjunaṃ lakṣīkṛtyānya-jana-samudāyam evopadideśa bhagavān iti vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1533: lakṣyabhūtam arjunaṃ prati upadeśaṃ yojayitum aucitye saty evānyasyāpi upadeṣṭavyatvaṃ sambhaven na,
GE07bhg4c18u:1534: tv anyathā na ca parityjyety asya phala-tyāga eva tātparyam iti vyākhyeyam asya vākyasya -
GE07bhg4c18u:1536: nāyaṃ kiṅkaro nāyam ṛṇī ca rājan /
GE07bhg4c18u:1555: pūrvaṃ hi mad-anya-bhaktau sarva-śreṣṭhāyāṃ tavādhikāro nāstīty atas tvaṃ yat karoṣi yad aśnāsītyādi-bruvāṇena mayā karma-miśrāyāṃ bhaktau tavādhikāra uktaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1556: samprati tv atikṛpayā tubhyam ananya-bhaktau evādhikāras tasyā ananya-bhakter yādṛcchika-mad-aikāntika-bhakta-kṛpaika-labhyatva-lakṣaṇaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1557: niyamaṃ sva-kṛtam api bhīṣma-yuddhe sva-pratijñām ivāpanīya datta iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1558: na ca mad-ājñayā nitya-naimittika-karma-tyāge tava prayavāya-śaṅkā sambhavet /
GE07bhg4c18u:1559: veda-rūpeṇa mayaiva nitya-karmānuṣṭhānam ādiṣṭam adhunā tu svarūpeṇaiva tat-tyāga ādiśyate ity ataḥ kathaṃ te nitya-karmākaraṇe
GE07bhg4c18u:1561: pratyuta ataḥ paraṃ nitya-karmaṇi kṛta eva pāpāni bhaviṣyanti sākṣān mad-ājñā-laṅghanād ity avadheyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1563: sa hi mūlya-krītaḥ paśur iva tad-adhīnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1568: tad eva bhuṅkte iti śaraṇāpatti-lakṣaṇasya dharmasya tattvam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1573: bhakti-śāstra-vihitā svābhīṣṭa-devāya rocamānā pravṛttir ānukūlyaṃ tad-viparītaṃ prātikūlyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1574: goptṛtve iti sa eva mama rakṣako nānya iti yat /
GE07bhg4c18u:1575: rakṣiṣyatīti sva-rakṣaṇa-prātikūlya-vastuṣūpasthiteṣv api sa māṃ rakṣiṣyaty eveti draupadī-gajendrādīnām iva viśvāsaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1576: niḥkṣepanaṃ svīya-sthūla-sūkṣma-deha-sahitasya eva svasya śrī-kṛṣṇārtha eva viniyogaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1577: akārpaṇyaṃ nānyatra kvāpi sva-dainya-jñāpanam iti ṣaṇṇāṃ vastūnāṃ vidhātr-anuṣṭhānaṃ yasyāṃ sā śaraṇāgatir iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1578: tad adyārabhya yady ahaṃ tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gata eva varte tarhi tva-uktaṃ bhadram abhadraṃ vā yad bhavet tad eva mama kartavyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1579: tatra yadi tvaṃ māṃ dharmam eva kārayasi tadā na kācic cintā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1580: yadi tv īśvaratvāt svairācāras tvaṃ mām adharmam eva kārayasi,
GE07bhg4c18u:1581: tadā kā gatis tatrāha aham iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1582: prācīnārvācīnāni yāvanti vartante yāvanti vā ahaṃ kārayiṣyāmi tebhyaḥ sarvebhya eva pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1583: nāham anya-śaraṇya iva tatrāsamartha iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1584: tvām alambyaiva śāstram idaṃ loka-mātram evopadiṣṭavān asmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1585: mā śucaḥ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ vā śokaṃ mā kārṣīḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1586: yuṣmad-ādikaṃ sarva eva lokaḥ sva-para-dharmān sarvān eva parityajya mac-cintanādi-paro māṃ śaraṇam āpadya sukhenaiva vartatām /
GE07bhg4c18u:1592: hanta etāvān bhāro mayā sva-prabhau nikṣipta ity api śokaṃ mākārṣīr bhakta-vatsalasya
GE07bhg4c18u:1593: mama na tatrāyāsa-leśo 'pīti nātaḥ param adhikam upadeṣṭavyam astīti śāstraṃ samāptīkṛtam //66 //
GE07bhg4c18u:1594: Baladeva: nanu yajana-praṇaty-ādis tava śuddhā bhaktiḥ prāktana-karma-rūpānanta-pāpa-malina-hṛdā
GE07bhg4c18u:1595: puṃsā kathaḥ śakyā kartuṃ yāvat tvad-bhakti-virodhīni tāny anantāni pāpāni kṛcchrādi-prāyaścittaiḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1596: savihitaiś ca dharmair na vinaśyeyur iti cet tatrāha - sarveti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1597: prāktana-pāpa-prāyaścitta-bhūtān kṛcchrādīn sa-vihitāṃś ca sarvān dharmān parityajya
GE07bhg4c18u:1598: svarūpatas tyaktvā māṃ sarveśvaraṃ kṛṣṇaṃ nṛsiṃha-dāśarathy-ādi-rūpeṇa bahudhāvirbhūtaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1600: na tu matto 'nyaṃ śiti-kaṇṭhādiṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja prapadyasva /
GE07bhg4c18u:1601: śaraṇyaḥ sarveśvaro 'haṃ sarva-pāpebhyo prāktana-karmabhyas tvāṃ śaraṇāgataṃ mokṣayiṣyāmīti mithaḥ-kartavyatā darśitā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1604: icchatāticira-sādhyā duṣkarāś ca te kṛcchrādayaḥ katham anuṣṭheyā iti śokaṃ mā kārṣīr ity arthaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1605: atra mat-prapattur na bhaved ity uktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1606: śrutiś caivam āha - na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgenaivke 'mṛtatvam ānaśuḥ iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1608: saniṣṭhānāṃ hṛd-viśuddhaye pariniṣṭhitānāṃ ca loka-saṅgrahāya yathāyathaṃ kāryās te dharmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1609: tam etam ity ādibhyaḥ satyena labhyas tapasā hy eṣa ātmā ity ādibhyaś ca śrutibhyaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1610: na ca vihita-tyāge pratyavāya-lakṣaṇaṃ pāpaṃ syād iti śokaṃ mā kurv iti vyākhyeyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1611: veda-nideśenāgni-hotrādi-tyāge yater iva pareśānideśena tat-tyāge tat-prapattus tad-ayogāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1617: na ca na hi kvacit ity ādi nyāyena svadharmānuṣṭhānāpattis tad-yajanādi-niratasya tena nyāyena tad-anāpatteḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1618: tathā ca sanniṣṭhasyātmānubhavāntaḥpariniṣṭhitasya ca parātmānubhavānto yathā dharmācāras tathā prapattuḥ śuddhāntaḥ sa iti evam evoktam ekādaśe
GE07bhg4c18u:1637: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yobhyasūyati //67//
GE07bhg4c18u:1638: Śrīdhara: evaṃ gītārtha-tattvam upadiśya tat-sampradāya-pravartane niyamam āha idam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1639: idaṃ gītārtha-tattvaṃ te tvayā atapaskāya dharmānuṣṭhāna-hīnāya na vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1640: na ca abhaktāya gurāv īśvare ca bhakti-śūnyāya kadācid api na vācyaṃ na cāśuśrūṣave paricaryām akurvate vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1641: māṃ parameśvaraṃ yo 'bhyasūyati manuṣya-dṛṣṭyā doṣāropeṇa nindati tasmai na ca vācyam //67//
GE07bhg4c18u:1642: Viśvanātha: evaṃ gītā-śāstram upadiśya sampradāya-pravartane niyamam āha idam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1643: atapaskāya asaṃyatendriyāya manaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca aikāgryaṃ paramaṃ tapaḥ iti smṛteḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1644: saṃyatendriye saty api abhaktāya na vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1645: saṃyatendriyatvādi-dharma-traya-vattve 'pi yo mām abhyasūyati mayi nirupādhi-pūrṇa-brahmaṇi māyā-sāvarṇya-doṣam āropayati tasmai sarvathaiva na vācyam //67//
GE07bhg4c18u:1646: Baladeva: atha svopadiṣṭaṃ gītā-śāstraṃ pātrebhyaḥ eva na tv apātrebhyo deyam iti upadiśati idam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1647: idaṃ śāstraṃ te tvayātapaskāya ajitendriyāya na vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1648: tapasvine 'py abhaktāya śāstropadeṣṭari tvayi śāstra-pratipādye mayi ca sarveśa-bhakti-śūnyāya na vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1649: tapasvine 'pi bhaktāyāśuśrūṣave śrotum anicchave na vācyam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1650: yo māṃ sarveśvaraṃ nitya-guṇa-vigraham abhyasūyati mayi māyika-guṇa-vigrahatām āropayati,
GE07bhg4c18u:1651: tasmai tu naiva vācyam ity ato bhinnayā vibhaktyā tasya nirdeśaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1652: evam āha sūtrakāraḥ anāviṣkurvann anvayāt iti (Vs 3.4.50) //67//
GE07bhg4c18u:1654: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1655: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ //68//
GE07bhg4c18u:1656: Śrīdhara: etair doṣair virahitebhyo gītā-śāstropadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1658: sa mayi parāṃ bhaktiṃ karoti tato niḥsaṃśayaḥ san mām eva prāpnotīty arthaḥ //68//
GE07bhg4c18u:1659: Viśvanātha: etad upadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti dvābhyām /
GE07bhg4c18u:1663: Baladeva: śāstropadeṣṭuḥ phalam āha ya iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1664: etad upadeṣṭur ādau mat-para-bhakti-lābhas tato mat-pada-lābho bhavati //68//
GE07bhg4c18u:1666: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priyakṛttamaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1667: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi //69//
GE07bhg4c18u:1669: tasmān mad-bhaktebhyo gītā-śāstra-vyākhyātuḥ sakāśād anyo manuṣyeṣu madhye kaścid api mama priya-kṛttamo 'tyantaṃ paritoṣa-kartā nāsti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1670: na ca kālāntare bhavitā bhaviṣyati mamāpi tasmād anyaḥ priyataro 'dhunā bhuvi tāvan nāsti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1672: Viśvanātha: tasmād upadeṣṭuḥ sakāśāt anyo 'tipriyaṅkaro 'tipriyaś ca nāsti //69//
GE07bhg4c18u:1674: tasmād gītopadeṣṭuḥ sakāśād anyo manuṣyeṣu madhye mama priya-kṛttamaḥ paritoṣa-kartā pūrvaṃ nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1675: mama tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati //69//
GE07bhg4c18u:1677: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1678: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ //70//
GE07bhg4c18u:1679: Śrīdhara : paṭhataḥ phalam āha adhyeṣyata iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1680: āvayoḥ śrī-kṛṣṇārjunayor imaṃ dharmyaṃ dharmād anapetaṃ saṃvādaṃ yo 'dhyeṣyate japa-rūpeṇa
GE07bhg4c18u:1681: paṭhiṣyati tena puṃsā sarva-yajñebhyaḥ śreṣṭhena jñāna-yajñena aham iṣṭaḥ syāṃ bhaveyam iti me matiḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1682: yady apy asau gītārtham abudhyamāna eva kevalaṃ japati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1683: tathāpi mama tac chṛṇvato mām evāsau prakāśayatīti buddhir bhavati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1684: yathā loke yaṛcchayāpi yadā kaścit kadācit kasyacit nāma gṛhṇāti tadāsau mām evāyam āhavayatīti matvā tat-pārśvam āgacchati /
GE07bhg4c18u:1687: tathaiva asyāpi prasanno bhaveyam iti bhāvaḥ //70//
GE07bhg4c18u:1688: Viśvanātha : etad adhayana-phalam āha adhyeṣyata iti //70//
GE07bhg4c18u:1689: Baladeva : atha śāstrādhyetuḥ phalam āha adhyeṣyate ceti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1690: atra yo jñāna-yajño varṇitas tenāham etat-pāṭha-mātreṇaiveṣṭo 'bhyarcitaḥ syām iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1693: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1694: sopi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām //71//
GE07bhg4c18u:1695: Śrīdhara : anyasya japato yo 'nyaḥ kaścit śṛṇoti tasyāpi phalam āha śraddhāvān iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1696: yo naraḥ śraddhā-yuktaḥ kevalaṃ śṛṇuyād api śraddhāvān api yaḥ kaścit kim artham
GE07bhg4c18u:1697: uccair japati abaddhaḥ vā japatīti vā doṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ karoti tad-vyāvṛtty-artham āha
GE07bhg4c18u:1698: anasūyaś cāsūya-rahito yaḥ śṛṇuyāt so 'pi sarvaiḥ pāpair muktaḥ sann aśvamedhādi-puṇya-kṛtāṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1702: yaḥ kevalaṃ śraddhayā śṛṇoti anasūyaḥ kim artham uccair aśuddhaṃ vā paṭhatīti doṣa-dṛṣṭim
GE07bhg4c18u:1703: akurvan so 'pi nikhilaiḥ pāpair muktaḥ puṇya-karmaṇām aśvamedhādi-yājināṃ lokān prāpnuyāt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1704: yad vā puṇya-karmaṇāṃ bhaktimatāṃ lokān dhruva-lokādīn vaikuṇṭha-bhedān ity arthaḥ //71//
GE07bhg4c18u:1706: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1708: Śrīdhara : samyag bodhānupapattau punar upadekṣyāmīty āśayenāha kaccid iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1712: Viśvanātha : samyag bodhānupapattau punar upadekṣyāmīty āśayenāha kaccid iti //72//
GE07bhg4c18u:1716: samyag-anubhavānudaye punar apy etad upadekṣyāmīti bhāvaḥ //72//
GE07bhg4c18u:1719: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta /
GE07bhg4c18u:1721: Śrīdhara : kṛtārthaḥ sann arjuna uvāca naṣṭa iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1722: ātma-viṣaye moho naṣṭaḥ yato 'yam aham asmīti svarūpānusandhāna-rūpā smṛtis tvat-prasādān mayā labdhā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1724: gataḥ dharma-viṣayaḥ sandeho yasya so 'haṃ tava ājñāṃ kariṣye iti //73//
GE07bhg4c18u:1725: Viśvanātha : kim ataḥ paraṃ pṛcchāmy ahaṃ tu sarva-dharmān parityajya tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gato niścinta eva tvayi viśrambhavān asmīty āha naṣṭa iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1726: kariṣya ity ataḥ paraṃ śaraṇasya tavājñāyāṃ sthitir eva śaraṇāpannasya mama dharmaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1727: na tu svāśrama-dharmo na tu jñāna-yogādaraḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1729: tataś ca bhoḥ priyasakha arjuna mama bhū-bhāra-haraṇe kiñcid avaśiṣṭaṃ kṛtyam asti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1730: tat tu tad-dvāraiva cikīrṣāmīti bhagavatokte gati gāṇḍīva-pāṇir arjuno yoddhum udatiṣṭhād iti //73//
GE07bhg4c18u:1731: Baladeva : evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ pārthaḥ śāstrānubhavaṃ phala-dvāreṇāha naṣṭa iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1732: moho viparīta-jñāna-lakṣaṇaḥ mama naṣṭas tvat-prasādād eva smṛtiś ca yathāvasthita-vastu-niṣṭhayā mayā labdhā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1735: etad uktaṃ bhavati - deva-mānavādayo nikhilāḥ prāṇinaḥ sarve sva-sva-karmasu svatantrā dehābhimānino māna-vairarcitā devās tebhyo 'bhīṣṭa-pradāḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1737: sa hi nirguṇo nirākṛtir udāsīnas tat-sannidhānāt prakṛtir jagad-dhetur ity evaṃ viparīta-jñāna-lakṣaṇo yo mohaḥ pūrvaṃ mamābhūt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1740: prakṛti-jīva-kālākhya-śaktibhiḥ saṅkalpa-mātreṇa jīva-karmānuguṇo vicitra-sarga-kṛt sva-bhaktebhyaḥ sva-paryanta-sarva-prado 'kiñcana-bhakta-vittaḥ
GE07bhg4c18u:1741: sa ca tvam eva mat-sakho vasudeva-sūnur iti tāttvikaṃ jñānaṃ mamābhūt /
GE07bhg4c18u:1742: ataḥ paraṃ tvām ahaṃ prapannaḥ sthito 'smi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1743: tvaṃ māṃ kadācid api na tyakṣyasīti sandehaś ca me chinnaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1744: atha bhūbhāra-haraṇaṃ sva-prayojanaṃ cet prapannena mayā cikīrṣitaṃ tarhi tad-vacanaṃ
GE07bhg4c18u:1745: tava kariṣyāmīty arjuno dhanuḥ-pāṇir udatiṣṭhad iti //73 // __________________________________________________________
GE07bhg4c18u:1748: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1750: Śrīdhara : tad evaṃ dhṛtarāṣṭraṃ prati śrī-kṛṣṇārjuna-saṃvādaṃ kathayitvā prastutāṃ kathām anusandadhānaḥ sañjaya uvāca itīti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1751: lomaharṣaṇaṃ lomāñca-karaṃ saṃvādam aśrauṣaṃ śrutavān ahaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1754: yatra vartante tāṃ patra-dvayīṃ vināyakaḥ sva-vāhanenādhunā hṛtavān ity ataḥ punar nālikham /
GE07bhg4c18u:1757: iti śrīmad-bhagavad-gītā-ṭīkā sārārtha-darśinī samāptī-bhūtā satāṃ prītaye 'stād iti
GE07bhg4c18u:1759: mādhurī dhinutād asyā mādhurī bhātu me hṛdi //
GE07bhg4c18u:1764: atha kathā-sambandham anusandadhānaḥ sañjayo dhṛtarāṣṭram uvāca ity aham iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1768: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param /
GE07bhg4c18u:1769: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam //75//
GE07bhg4c18u:1770: Śrīdhara : ātmanas tac-chravaṇe sambhāvanām āha vyāsa-prasādād iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1771: bhagavatā vyāsena divyaṃ cakṣuḥ śrotrādi machyaṃ dattam ato vyāsasya prasādāt etat ahaṃ śrutavān asmi /
GE07bhg4c18u:1772: kiṃ tad ity apekṣāyām āha paraṃ yogaṃ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1773: paratvaṃ āviṣkaroti yogeśvarāt śrī-kṛṣṇāt svayam eva sākṣāt kathayataḥ śrutavān iti //75//
GE07bhg4c18u:1776: kim etad ity āha param yogam iti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1780: teṣām adhīśān niyantuḥ svayaṃ-rūpāt kṛṣṇāt sva-mukhenaiva,
GE07bhg4c18u:1784: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1785: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ //76//
GE07bhg4c18u:1787: hṛṣyāmi romāñcito bhavāmi harṣaṃ prāpnomīti vā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1789: Baladeva : rājan dhṛtarāṣṭra puṇyaṃ śrotur avidyā-paryanta-sarva-doṣa-haram /
GE07bhg4c18u:1792: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1793: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ //77//
GE07bhg4c18u:1797: Baladeva : tac ca viśva-rūpaṃ yad arjunāyopadiṣṭam //77//
GE07bhg4c18u:1799: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1800: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama //78//
GE07bhg4c18u:1801: Śrīdhara : atas tvaṃ putrāṇāṃ rājyādi-śaṅkā parityajety āśayenāha yatreti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1802: yatra yeṣāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ pakṣe yogeśvaraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo vartate,
GE07bhg4c18u:1803: yatra ca pārthaḥ gāṇḍīva-dhanur-dharas tatraiva ca śrī rāja-lakṣmīs tatraiva niściteti sambadhyate iti mama matir niścayaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1804: ata idānīm api tāvat saputras tvaṃ śrī-kṛṣṇaṃ śaraṇam upetya pāṇḍavān prasādya sarvaṃ ca tebhyo nivedya putra-prāṇa-rakṣāṃ kuru iti bhāvaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1814: ity ādau bhagavad-bhakter mokṣaṃ prati sādhakatamatva-śravaṇāt tad-ekānta-bhaktir eva tat-prasādottha-jñānāvāntara-vyāpāra-mātra-yukto mokṣa-hetur iti sphuṭaṃ pratīyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1824: na ca jñānam eva bhaktir iti yuktam /
GE07bhg4c18u:1825: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad-bhaktiṃ labhate parām (Gītā 18.54) /
GE07bhg4c18u:1826: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ //
GE07bhg4c18u:1828: na caivaṃ sati tam eva viditvātimṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya iti śruti-virodhaḥ śaṅkanīyaḥ bhakty-avāntara-vyāpāratvāt jñānasya
GE07bhg4c18u:1829: na hi kāṣṭhaiḥ pacati ity ukte jvālānām asādhyanatvam uktaṃ bhavati / kiṃ ca
GE07bhg4c18u:1836: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhya ity ādi-śruti-smṛti-purāṇa-vacanāny evaṃ sati samañjasāni bhavanti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1837: tasmāt bhagavad-bhaktir eva mokṣa-hetur iti siddham //
GE07bhg4c18u:1839: sa eva paramānandas tayā prīṇātu mādhavaḥ //
GE07bhg4c18u:1843: tattvaṃ prepsur upaiti kiṃ guru-kṛpā-pīyūṣa-dṛṣṭiṃ vinā /
GE07bhg4c18u:1844: ambu svāñjalinā nirasya jaladher āditsur antarmaṇī
GE07bhg4c18u:1845: nāvarteṣu na kiṃ nimajjati janaḥ sat-karṇa-dhāraṃ vinā //
GE07bhg4c18u:1846: iti śrī-Śrīdhara-svāmi-kṛtāyāṃ śrīmad-bhagavad-gītā-ṭīkāyāṃ subodhinyāṃ paramārtha-nirṇayo nāma aṣṭādaśo 'dhyāyaḥ //78//
GE07bhg4c18u:1847: Baladeva: evaṃ ca sati sva-putra-vijayādi-spṛhāṃ parityajety āha yatreti /
GE07bhg4c18u:1848: yatra yogeśvaraḥ pūrvaṃ vyākhyātaḥ sva-saṅkalpāyatta-svetara-sarva-prāṇi-svarūpa-sthiti-pravṛttikaḥ kṛṣṇo vasudeva-sūnuḥ sārathya-paryanta-sāhāyya-kāritayā vartate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1849: yatra pārthas tvat-pitṛ-svasṛ-putro narāvatāraḥ kṛṣṇaikāntī dhanurdharo 'cchedya-gāṇḍīva-pāṇir vartate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1850: tatraiva śrī-kṛṣṇārjunādhiṣṭhite yudhiṣṭhira-pakṣe śrī-rāja-lakṣmīḥ vijayaḥ śatru-paribhava-hetukaḥ paramotkarṣaḥ /
GE07bhg4c18u:1852: nītir nyāya-pravṛttir dhruvā sthireti sarvatra sambadhyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1853: yat tu yuddha-param etac chāstram iti śaṅkyate /
GE07bhg4c18u:1854: tan na - man-manā bhava mad-bhakta ity ādeḥ,
GE07bhg4c18u:1855: sarva-dharmān parityajya ity ādeś copadeśas tasmāc catūrṇāṃ varṇānām āśramāṇāṃ ca dharmā
GE07bhg4c18u:1856: hṛd-viśuddhi-hetutayā loka-saṅgrahārthatayā ceha nirūpitā ity eva suṣṭhu //78//
GE07bhg4c18u:1858: kṣipraṃ prasādanī viṣṇor ity aṣṭādaśato matam //
GE07bhg4c18u:1860: sphītaṃ sad-guṇa-vṛndais tad atra gītaṃ paraṃ tattvam //
